                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">∥</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.Ex5.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex5.m1.1">Ω</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Clearly, such rescaling does not change the value of <Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="S2.SS1.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S2.SS1.p7">
        <p>We note that the standard elliptic theory ensures existence and
uniqueness of a unique solution <Math mode="inline" tex="p\in H^{1}_{D}({{\Omega}})" text="p element-of (H ^ 1) _ D * Omega" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SS1.p7.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m1.1">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. However, since the
<!--  %**** String Line 375 **** -->coefficient matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="K(x)" text="K * x" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.SS1.p7.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is piece-wise smooth and may have very large
jumps, the solution <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has low regularity, say <Math mode="inline" tex="H^{1+s}({{\Omega}})" text="H ^ (1 + s) * Omega" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.SS1.p7.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m4.1">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="s&gt;0" text="s &gt; 0" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> could depend on the contrast <Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in a subtle (and
unfavorable) way. We need to take this into account when proving the
stability of the discrete methods with constants independent of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="S2.SS1.p7.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:s:weak" xml:id="S2.SS2">
      <tags>
        <tag>2.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§2.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=". ">2.2</tag>Weak formulations of the elliptic problem</title>
      <toctitle><tag close=" ">2.2</tag>Weak formulations of the elliptic problem</toctitle>
      <para xml:id="S2.SS2.p1">
        <p>Now we introduce the dual mixed and least-squares formulations of the
problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:equation-1"/>) – (<ref labelref="LABEL:N_BC"/>).</p>
      </para>
      <subsubsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:ss:dual_form" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1">
        <tags>
          <tag>2.2.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.2.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">§2.2.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title><tag close=". ">2.2.1</tag>Dual mixed formulation</title>
        <toctitle><tag close=" ">2.2.1</tag>Dual mixed formulation</toctitle>
        <para xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1">
          <p>To present the dual mixed weak form we require the following notation
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{V}}}\equiv{{\bm{H}}_{\hskip-0.569055ptN}}({\operatorname{div}};\Omega)" text="V equivalent-to H _ N * list@(div, Omega)" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equivalent-to" name="equiv" role="RELOP">≡</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m1.1">div</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m1.2">Ω</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
and
<Math mode="inline" tex="W\equiv\{q\in L^{2}(\Omega)~{}~{}\text{and}~{}(q,1)=0~{}~{}~{}\text{if}~{}~{}~%&#10;{}\Gamma_{N}=\partial\Omega\}." xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equivalent-to" name="equiv" role="RELOP">≡</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m2.1">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="6.6pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMText rpadding="3.3pt">and</XMText>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m2.2">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p1.m2.3">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" rpadding="9.9pt">0</XMTok>
                  <XMText rpadding="9.9pt">if</XMText>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math></p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2">
          <p>We multiply the first equation by <Math mode="inline" tex="K^{-1}(x)" text="K ^ (- 1) * x" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
a test function <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{v}}}" text="v" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, integrate over <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}" text="Omega" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and perform integration by parts to get</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:first" xml:id="S2.E8">

                          </XMDual>

                      </XMWrap>

                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.E8.m1.5">

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 400 **** -->                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Next, we multiply the second equation by a test function
<Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and integrate over <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\Omega}}" text="Omega" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to get</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:div-eqn" xml:id="S2.E9">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2.9)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2.9</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="({\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{u}}},q)=(f,q)." text="open-interval@(div@(u), q) = open-interval@(f, q)" xml:id="S2.E9.m1">

                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.E9.m1.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.E9.m1.4">

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>

                          </XMApp>

                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E9.m1.2">f</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E9.m1.3">q</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Then the weak form of the problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:equation-1"/>) – (<ref labelref="LABEL:N_BC"/>)
is: find <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{u}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}" text="u element-of V" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="p\in W" text="p element-of W" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:dual_mixed" xml:id="S2.E10">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2.10)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2.10</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{DM}({{\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)=-(f,q),\quad\mbox{for %&#10;all}\quad({{\mathbf{v}}},q)\in{{\bm{V}}}\times W," text="formulae@(A ^ (D * M) * vector@(u, p, v, q) = list@(- open-interval@(f, q), [for all]), open-interval@(v, q) element-of V * W)" xml:id="S2.E10.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.10.1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.9"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S2.E10.m1.10.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.5"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.6"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.5">f</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.6">q</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMText xml:id="S2.E10.m1.9">for all</XMText>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.E10.m1.10.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.7"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.8"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.7">v</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.8">q</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>where the bilinear form
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{DM}({{\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q):({{\bm{V}}},W)\times({%&#10;{\bm{V}}},W)\to{\mathbb{R}}" text="A ^ (D * M) * vector@(u, p, v, q) colon open-interval@(V, W) * open-interval@(V, W) to R" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8.1">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8.2">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS1.p2.m8.5">V</XMTok>

                        <XMWrap>

                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is defined as</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:A-form-mixed" xml:id="S2.E11">

        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" xml:id="S2.Thmremark1">
          <tags>
            <tag>Remark 2.1</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">2.1</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 2.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 2.1</text></tag>.</title>
          <para xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">It is clear that we could test the equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:div-eqn"/>)
with <Math mode="inline" tex="q={\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}}" text="q = div@(v)" xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, multiply
by an arbitrary positive constant <Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, and add to
equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:first"/>). This will result in a slightly different bilinear form</text></p>
            <equation xml:id="S2.Ex6">
              <Math mode="display" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{DM}_{\beta}({{\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q):=({{\alpha}}{{%&#10;\mathbf{u}}},{{\mathbf{v}}})+\beta({\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{u}}},{%&#10;\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})-(p,{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})-({%&#10;\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{u}}},q)." text="(A ^ (D * M)) _ beta * vector@(u, p, v, q) assign (open-interval@(alpha * u, v) + beta * open-interval@(div@(u), div@(v))) - open-interval@(p, div@(v)) - open-interval@(div@(u), q)" xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.8"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.8">
                        <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.1"/>

                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.8.2"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.8.3"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.8.2">
                                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.8.3">
                                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.6"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.8.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.6">p</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.8.4">
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.8.5"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.7"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.8.5">
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.7">q</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
            <p><text font="italic">and modified right hand side of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:dual_mixed"/>) equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="-(f,q)+\beta(f,{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})" text="(- open-interval@(f, q)) + beta * open-interval@(f, div@(v))" xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.1">f</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.2">q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.3">f</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmremark1.p1.m3.4">
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>. This modified problem will have the same
solution. However, such formulation might be beneficial in the design
of a better preconditioner for the finite element system, see,
e.g. <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="vassilevski1996preconditioning" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.</text></p>
          </para>
        </theorem>
      </subsubsection>
      <subsubsection inlist="toc" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2">
        <tags>
          <tag>2.2.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.2.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">§2.2.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title><tag close=". ">2.2.2</tag>Least-squares formulation</title>
        <toctitle><tag close=" ">2.2.2</tag>Least-squares formulation</toctitle>
        <para xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1">
          <p>In this case we take the
<Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}" text="L ^ 2" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-norm of the second equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:equation-2"/>) and the weighted <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}" text="L ^ 2" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-norm
with weight <Math mode="inline" tex="K^{-1/2}" text="K ^ (- 1 / 2)" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of the first equations in (<ref labelref="LABEL:equation-1"/>)
to obtain a quadratic functional, e.g. <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="pehlivanov1994least" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.
Then the minimizer of this least-squares functional satisfies
the following weak form: find <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{u}}}\in{{\bm{H}}_{\hskip-0.569055ptN}}({\operatorname{div}})" text="u element-of H _ N * div" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m4.1">div</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="p\in H^{1}_{D}({{\Omega}})" text="p element-of (H ^ 1) _ D * Omega" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m5.1">Ω</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:LS" xml:id="S2.E12">

          <p>where the bilinear form

is defined as</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:A-form-LS" xml:id="S2.E13">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2.13)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2.13</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{LS}({{\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q):=({{\alpha}}{{\mathbf{%&#10;u}}},{{\mathbf{v}}})+({\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{u}}},{\operatorname{div}}{%&#10;{\mathbf{v}}})+(p,{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})+({\operatorname{div}}{{%&#10;\mathbf{u}}},q)+(K\nabla p,\nabla q)." text="A ^ (L * S) * vector@(u, p, v, q) assign open-interval@(alpha * u, v) + open-interval@(div@(u), div@(v)) + open-interval@(p, div@(v)) + open-interval@(div@(u), q) + open-interval@(K * nabla@(p), nabla@(q))" xml:id="S2.E13.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8">
                      <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
<!--  %**** String Line 450 **** -->                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.2"/>

                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E13.m1.1">u</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E13.m1.2">p</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.5"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E13.m1.5">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8.2">
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8.3">
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.6"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E13.m1.6">p</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8.4">

                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8.5"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.7"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8.5">
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E13.m1.7">q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8.6"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E13.m1.8.7"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8.6">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S2.E13.m1.8.7">
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Clearly, the bilinear
form <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{LS}({{\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)" text="A ^ (L * S) * vector@(u, p, v, q)" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.2">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.3">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m7.4">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is symmetric and coercive, see, e.g.
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="pehlivanov1994least" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. We would like to establish the coercivity with a
constant independent of the
contrast <Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="S2.SS2.SSS2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and later we provide a proof of this.</p>
        </para>
      </subsubsection>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" xml:id="S2.SS3">
      <tags>
        <tag>2.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§2.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=". ">2.3</tag>Stability of the weak formulations</title>
      <toctitle><tag close=" ">2.3</tag>Stability of the weak formulations</toctitle>
      <para xml:id="S2.SS3.p1">
        <p>Now we study the stability of the discrete problems (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:dual_mixed"/>) and
(<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:LS"/>). We shall use the Poincaré inequality</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:Poincare" xml:id="S2.E14">
          <tags>
            <tag>(2.14)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">2.14</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\text{there is $C_{P}&gt;0$ such that}~{}~{}\mbox{for all}\quad q\in H^{1}_{D}(%&#10;\Omega)\quad\|q\|^{2}\leq C_{P}\|\nabla q\|^{2}." text="formulae@(list@([there is &gt;CP0 such that] * [for all], q) element-of (H ^ 1) _ D * Omega, (norm@(q)) ^ 2 less= C _ P * (norm@(nabla@(q))) ^ 2)" xml:id="S2.E14.m1">
            <XMath>

                                  <XMath>

                                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.E14.m1.4.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>

                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>The constant <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{P}" text="C _ P" xml:id="S2.SS3.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> depends only on the geometry of the domain
<Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega" text="Omega" xml:id="S2.SS3.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and the splitting of <Math mode="inline" tex="\partial\Omega" text="partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="S2.SS3.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> into <Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma_{D}" text="Gamma _ D" xml:id="S2.SS3.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma_{N}" text="Gamma _ N" xml:id="S2.SS3.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Moreover, due to (<ref labelref="LABEL:bound_below_K"/>) on the
coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="K(x)" text="K * x" xml:id="S2.SS3.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.p1.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we also have the inequality</p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\|q\|^{2}\leq C_{P}\|\nabla q\|^{2}\leq C_{P}\|\nabla q\|^{2}_{0,K}." text="(norm@(q)) ^ 2 less= C _ P * (norm@(nabla@(q))) ^ 2 less= C _ P * ((norm@(nabla@(q))) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, K))" xml:id="S2.Ex7.m1">
            <XMath>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

<!--  %**** String Line 475 **** -->      <subsubsection inlist="toc" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1">
        <tags>
          <tag>2.3.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.3.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">§2.3.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title><tag close=". ">2.3.1</tag>Stability of the mixed formulation</title>
        <toctitle><tag close=" ">2.3.1</tag>Stability of the mixed formulation</toctitle>
        <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1">
          <p>First, we consider the mixed form. For this we need continuity and
<text font="italic">inf-sup</text> condition (see, e.g. <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="1991BrezziF_FortinM-aa" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>)
for the bilinear form <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{DM}({{\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)" text="A ^ (D * M) * vector@(u, p, v, q)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.2">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.3">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m1.4">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
on the spaces <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{V}}}" text="V" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(\Omega)" text="L ^ 2 * Omega" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m3.1">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> equipped with the weighted norm
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\Lambda_{{\alpha}}({{\mathbf{v}}},{{\mathbf{v}}}))^{\frac{1}{2}}" text="(Lambda _ alpha * open-interval@(v, v)) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>

                        </XMApp>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="script" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and the standard <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}" text="L ^ 2" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </Math>,
respectively.</p>

        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem:stab_var" xml:id="S2.Thmlemma1">
          <tags>
            <tag>Lemma 2.1</tag>

          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 2.1</text></tag>.</title>
          <para xml:id="S2.Thmlemma1.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="W=L^{2}(\Omega)" text="W = L ^ 2 * Omega" xml:id="S2.Thmlemma1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmlemma1.p1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{V}}}={{\bm{H}}_{\hskip-0.569055ptN}}({\operatorname{div}})" text="V = H _ N * div" xml:id="S2.Thmlemma1.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>

                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>

                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmlemma1.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{{\alpha}}}:=(\Lambda_{{\alpha}}({{\mathbf{v}}},{{%&#10;\mathbf{v}}}))^{\frac{1}{2}}" text="(norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ alpha assign (Lambda _ alpha * open-interval@(v, v)) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S2.Thmlemma1.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmlemma1.p1.m3.4"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>. Then the following inequalities hold</text></p>

              <item xml:id="S2.I1.i2">
                <tags>
                  <tag>(2)</tag>
                  <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
                  <tag role="typerefnum">item 2</tag>
                </tags>
                <para xml:id="S2.I1.i2.p1">
                  <p><text font="italic">There is a constant </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{{\alpha}}_{0}&gt;0" text="alpha _ 0 &gt; 0" xml:id="S2.I1.i2.p1.m1">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math><text font="italic"> independent of </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S2.I1.i2.p1.m2">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math><text font="italic"> such that</text></p>
                  <equation labels="LABEL:A-infsup" xml:id="S2.E16">
                    <tags>
                      <tag>(2.16)</tag>
                      <tag role="refnum">2.16</tag>
                    </tags>
                    <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}},\,q\in L^{2}}\frac{{{\mathcal{A}}}^{DM}({{%&#10;\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)}{(\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}_{\Lambda_{{\alpha}}}%&#10;+\|q\|^{2})^{\frac{1}{2}}}\geq\alpha_{0}(\|{{\mathbf{u}}}\|^{2}_{\Lambda_{{%&#10;\alpha}}}+\|p\|^{2})^{\frac{1}{2}}" text="(supremum _ (formulae@(v element-of V, q element-of L ^ 2)))@((A ^ (D * M) * vector@(u, p, v, q)) / (((norm@(v)) ^ 2) _ Lambda _ alpha + (norm@(q)) ^ 2) ^ (1 / 2)) &gt;= alpha _ 0 * (((norm@(u)) ^ 2) _ Lambda _ alpha + (norm@(p)) ^ 2) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S2.E16.m1">

                    </Math>
                  </equation>
                </para>
