            </enumerate>
          </para>
        </theorem>
        <proof>
          <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
          <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2">
            <p>The first inequality follows immediately by applying Schwarz inequality to all three terms and having
in mind that <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\alpha}}" text="alpha" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a positive function. Proving the <text font="italic">inf-sup</text> condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:A-infsup"/>) is equivalent
to proving the following inequality (see, <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Ern-Guermond" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>):</p>
            <equation labels="LABEL:inf_sup_stab_var" xml:id="S2.E17">
              <tags>
                <tag>(2.17)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">2.17</tag>
              </tags>
              <Math mode="display" tex="\inf_{q\in W}\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}}\frac{(\nabla\cdot{{\mathbf{v}}%&#10;},q)}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{{\alpha}}}\|q\|}\geq\gamma&gt;0,\qquad\mbox{%&#10;for all}\quad{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}},\quad\mbox{for all}\quad q\in W." text="formulae@((infimum _ (q element-of W))@((supremum _ (v element-of V))@(open-interval@(nabla cdot v, q) / ((norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ alpha * norm@(q)))) &gt;= gamma &gt; 0, list@([for all], v) element-of V, list@([for all], q) element-of W)" xml:id="S2.E17.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.9"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S2.E17.m1.9">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.9.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.9.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.9.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.E17.m1.9.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                                <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                                  <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="bold" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.2"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.E17.m1.2">
                                        <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E17.m1.1">q</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.3"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E17.m1.3">v</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.4"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E17.m1.4">q</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.E17.m1.9.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.5"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.6"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMText xml:id="S2.E17.m1.5">for all</XMText>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E17.m1.6">v</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.E17.m1.9.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.7"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E17.m1.8"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMText xml:id="S2.E17.m1.7">for all</XMText>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E17.m1.8">q</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
            <p>As is well known, if <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is independent of the contrast
<Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, then so is <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha_{0}" text="alpha _ 0" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and for more details on the relation
between the constants <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha_{0}" text="alpha _ 0" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> we refer to
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Xu2003Zikatanov" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. It is clear then that proving a contrast
independent estimate for <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, which we show next, automatically
leads to a contrast independent <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha_{0}" text="alpha _ 0" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p2.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</p>
          </para>
          <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3">
            <p>Inf-sup condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:inf_sup_stab_var"/>) for Raviart-Thomas
finite element spaces and standard <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{H}}}_{N}({\operatorname{div}})" text="H _ N * div" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m1.1">div</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-norm is a well known fact.
However, we have slight modification the <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{H}}}_{N}({\operatorname{div}})" text="H _ N * div" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m2.1">div</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-norm
and we would like to show that the constant <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> does not
depend on the contrast <Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p3.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. For this reason we provide a proof.</p>
          </para>
<!--  %**** String Line 525 **** -->          <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4">
            <p>We first prove that for all <Math mode="inline" tex="q\in W" text="q element-of W" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m1">

                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{w}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}" text="w element-of V" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m2">

                  <XMApp>

            <p>We then set <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{w}}}=K\nabla\varphi" text="w = K * nabla@(varphi)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. By construction <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{w}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}" text="w element-of V" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
with <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{w}}}=-q" text="div@(w) = - q" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>

                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> which holds in <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(\Omega)" text="L ^ 2 * Omega" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m7.1">Ω</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha K=I_{d\times d}" text="alpha * K = I _ (d * d)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> for almost all <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Omega" text="x element-of Omega" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, then</p>
            <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="Ax1.EGx3">
              <equation xml:id="S2.Ex10">

                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S2.Ex10.m3.6"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex10.m3.6">w</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S2.Ex10.m3.3"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S2.Ex10.m3.4"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.Ex10.m3.3">0</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex10.m3.4">α</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S2.Ex10.m3.7"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>

                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex10.m3.7">q</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMath>
                        </Math></td>
                    </tr>
                  </MathBranch>
                </MathFork>
              </equation>
            </equationgroup>
            <p>Here, we used the Poincaré inequality (<ref labelref="LABEL:Poincare"/>) and the fact
that from (<ref labelref="LABEL:bound_below_K"/>) we have
<Math mode="inline" tex="(K(x)\xi\cdot\xi)\geq(\xi\cdot\xi)" text="(K * x * xi) cdot xi &gt;= xi cdot xi" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m10.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m10.2">
                          <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m10.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m10.1">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m10.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m10.3">
                          <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi\in\mathbb{R}^{d}" text="xi element-of R ^ d" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Omega" text="x element-of Omega" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p4.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</p>
          </para>
<!--  %**** String Line 550 **** -->          <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p5">
            <p>Next, for any <Math mode="inline" tex="q\in L^{2}(\Omega)" text="q element-of L ^ 2 * Omega" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p5.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS1.p5.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS1.p5.m1.1">Ω</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> we have</p>
            <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="Ax1.EGx4">
              <equation xml:id="S2.Ex12">
                <MathFork>
                  <Math tex="\displaystyle\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}}\frac{(q,{\operatorname{div}}{{%&#10;\mathbf{v}}})}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{\alpha}}}\geq\frac{(q,{%&#10;\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{w}}})}{\|{{\mathbf{w}}}\|_{\Lambda_{\alpha}}}=%&#10;\frac{\|q\|^{2}}{(\|{{\mathbf{w}}}\|_{0,\alpha}^{2}+\|{\operatorname{div}}{{%&#10;\mathbf{w}}}\|^{2})^{\frac{1}{2}}}=\frac{\|q\|^{2}}{(\|{{\mathbf{w}}}\|_{0,%&#10;\alpha}^{2}+\|q\|^{2})^{\frac{1}{2}}}\geq\frac{\|q\|}{\sqrt{C_{P}+1}}." text="(supremum _ (v element-of V))@(open-interval@(q, div@(v)) / (norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ alpha) &gt;= open-interval@(q, div@(w)) / (norm@(w)) _ Lambda _ alpha = (norm@(q)) ^ 2 / (((norm@(w)) _ (list@(0, alpha))) ^ 2 + (norm@(div@(w))) ^ 2) ^ (1 / 2) = (norm@(q)) ^ 2 / (((norm@(w)) _ (list@(0, alpha))) ^ 2 + (norm@(q)) ^ 2) ^ (1 / 2) &gt;= norm@(q) / square-root@(C _ P + 1)" xml:id="S2.Ex12.m4">

                  <MathBranch>
                    <tr>
                      <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}}\frac{(q,{\operatorname{div}}{{%&#10;\mathbf{v}}})}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{\alpha}}}" text="(supremum _ (v element-of V))@(open-interval@(q, div@(v)) / (norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ alpha)" xml:id="S2.Ex11.m1">
                          <XMath>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="bold" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>

                            </XMApp>

              </equation>
            </equationgroup>
            <p>This completes the proof.

          </para>
        </proof>
      </subsubsection>
      <subsubsection inlist="toc" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2">
        <tags>
          <tag>2.3.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.3.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">§2.3.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title><tag close=". ">2.3.2</tag>Stability of the least-squares formulation</title>
        <toctitle><tag close=" ">2.3.2</tag>Stability of the least-squares formulation</toctitle>
        <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1">
          <p>For this we require continuity and coercivity of the bilinear form
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{LS}({{\mathbf{u}}},p;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)" text="A ^ (L * S) * vector@(u, p, v, q)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.2">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.3">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.4">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
on the space <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{H}}_{\hskip-0.569055ptN}}({\operatorname{div}})\times H^{1}_{0}(\Omega)%&#10;\equiv{{\bm{V}}}\times W" text="H _ N * div * (H ^ 1) _ 0 * Omega equivalent-to V * W" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equivalent-to" name="equiv" role="RELOP">≡</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m2.1">div</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m2.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m2.2">Ω</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
The space <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{H}}_{\hskip-0.569055ptN}}({\operatorname{div}})" text="H _ N * div" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m3.1">div</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is
equipped with the weighted norm
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\Lambda_{{\alpha}}({{\mathbf{v}}},{{\mathbf{v}}}))^{\frac{1}{2}}" text="(Lambda _ alpha * open-interval@(v, v)) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.1">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.2">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="script" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and the space <Math mode="inline" tex="H^{1}_{D}(\Omega)" text="(H ^ 1) _ D * Omega" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is equipped with the
norm <Math mode="inline" tex="\|q\|_{1,K}=\|K^{1/2}\nabla q\|" text="(norm@(q)) _ (list@(1, K)) = norm@(K ^ (1 / 2) * nabla@(q))" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>

                <para xml:id="S2.I2.i2.p1">
                  <p><text font="italic">For all </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}" text="v element-of V" xml:id="S2.I2.i2.p1.m1">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMApp>

                      <XMath>
                        <XMApp>

                      </XMath>
                    </Math><text font="italic"> then</text></p>
                  <equation labels="LABEL:A-coercivity" xml:id="S2.E21">
                    <tags>
                      <tag>(2.21)</tag>
                      <tag role="refnum">2.21</tag>
                    </tags>
                    <Math mode="display" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{LS}({{\mathbf{v}}},q;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)\geq\frac{1}{3}(\|{{%&#10;\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}_{\Lambda_{{\alpha}}}+\|q\|^{2}_{1,K})" text="A ^ (L * S) * vector@(v, q, v, q) &gt;= (1 / 3) * (((norm@(v)) ^ 2) _ Lambda _ alpha + ((norm@(q)) ^ 2) _ (list@(1, K)))" xml:id="S2.E21.m1">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.3"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.5"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.6"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.3">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.4">q</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.5">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.6">q</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.9"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S2.E21.m1.9">
                                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.7"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.7">v</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.8"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.8">q</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.1"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S2.E21.m1.2"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.1">1</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E21.m1.2">K</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math>
                  </equation>
                </para>
              </item>
            </enumerate>
          </para>
        </theorem>
        <proof>
          <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
          <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p2">
            <p>The bound (<ref labelref="LABEL:continuity_LS"/>) follows easily by first transforming the terms
<Math mode="inline" tex="({\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{u}}},q)" text="open-interval@(div@(u), q)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p2.m1">

                  <XMDual>

                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="({\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}},p)" text="open-interval@(div@(v), p)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p2.m2">

                  <XMDual>

                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                    </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p2.m2.2">

                      </XMApp>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> using integration by parts to

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="-(\nabla p,{{\mathbf{v}}})" text="- open-interval@(nabla@(p), v)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p2.m4">

              </Math> and then using Schwarz inequality.</p>
          </para>
          <para xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p3">
            <p>For the bound (<ref labelref="LABEL:A-coercivity"/>) we fist note that</p>

            <p>Next, we proceed as follows: using the Schwarz inequality, the

                  <XMApp>

                </XMath>
              </Math>, and
also <Math mode="inline" tex="2ab\leq\frac{1}{\epsilon}a^{2}+{\epsilon}b^{2}" text="2 * a * b less= (1 / epsilon) * a ^ 2 + epsilon * b ^ 2" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p3.m2">

              </Math> for all

                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="a,b\in\mathbb{R}" text="list@(a, b) element-of R" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p3.m4">
                <XMath>

                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> gives</p>
            <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="Ax1.EGx5">
              <equation xml:id="S2.Ex14">
                <MathFork>
                  <Math tex="\displaystyle{{\mathcal{A}}}^{LS}({{\mathbf{v}}},q;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)\geq(1-%&#10;\frac{1}{\epsilon})\|{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}+\|{{\mathbf{v}}}%&#10;\|_{0,\alpha}^{2}+\|q\|^{2}_{1,K}-\epsilon\|q\|^{2}\geq(1-\frac{1}{\epsilon})%&#10;\|{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}+\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha}+(%&#10;1-\epsilon C_{P})\|\nabla q\|_{0,K},\quad\epsilon&gt;0." text="formulae@(A ^ (L * S) * vector@(v, q, v, q) &gt;= ((1 - 1 / epsilon) * (norm@(div@(v))) ^ 2 + ((norm@(v)) _ (list@(0, alpha))) ^ 2 + ((norm@(q)) ^ 2) _ (list@(1, K))) - epsilon * (norm@(q)) ^ 2 &gt;= (1 - 1 / epsilon) * (norm@(div@(v))) ^ 2 + ((norm@(v)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha)) + (1 - epsilon * C _ P) * (norm@(nabla@(q))) _ (list@(0, K)), epsilon &gt; 0)" xml:id="S2.Ex14.m4">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m4.17"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S2.Ex14.m4.17">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m4.17.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m4.17.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex14.m4.17.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m4.9"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m4.10"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m4.11"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m4.12"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex14.m4.9">v</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex14.m4.10">q</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>

                      <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\geq(1-\frac{1}{\epsilon})\|{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^%&#10;{2}+\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha}+(1-\epsilon C_{P})\|\nabla q\|_{0,K},%&#10;\quad\epsilon&gt;0." text="formulae@(absent &gt;= (1 - 1 / epsilon) * (norm@(div@(v))) ^ 2 + ((norm@(v)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha)) + (1 - epsilon * C _ P) * (norm@(nabla@(q))) _ (list@(0, K)), epsilon &gt; 0)" xml:id="S2.Ex14.m3">

                                          <XMDual>

                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                                                </XMApp>
                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                            <XMDual>
                                              <XMApp>
                                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                                <XMRef idref="S2.Ex14.m3.6.1.2"/>
                                              </XMApp>

                                                <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex14.m3.6.1.2">
                                                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>

                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMDual>

                                          </XMApp>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                          <XMApp>

                                            <XMDual>
                                              <XMApp>

                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMDual>

                                            </XMDual>
                                            <XMDual>
                                              <XMApp>
                                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMWrap>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.Ex14.m3.3">0</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex14.m3.4">K</XMTok>
                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMDual>
                                          </XMApp>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex14.m3.6.2">
                                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMath>
                        </Math></td>
                    </tr>
                  </MathBranch>
                </MathFork>
              </equation>
            </equationgroup>
            <p>Choosing <Math mode="inline" tex="\epsilon=\frac{1}{2C_{P}}" text="epsilon = 1 / (2 * C _ P)" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p3.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
we get</p>
            <equation xml:id="S2.Ex15">
              <Math mode="display" tex="{{\mathcal{A}}}^{LS}({{\mathbf{v}}},q;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)\geq(1-2C_{P})\|{%&#10;\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}+\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{0,\alpha}^{2}+%&#10;\frac{1}{2}\|\nabla q\|_{0,K}^{2}." text="A ^ (L * S) * vector@(v, q, v, q) &gt;= (1 - 2 * C _ P) * (norm@(div@(v))) ^ 2 + ((norm@(v)) _ (list@(0, alpha))) ^ 2 + (1 / 2) * ((norm@(nabla@(q))) _ (list@(0, K))) ^ 2" xml:id="S2.Ex15.m1">

            <p>Now multiplying inequality (<ref labelref="LABEL:div_bound"/>) by a
constant <Math mode="inline" tex="\beta&gt;0" text="beta &gt; 0" xml:id="S2.SS3.SSS2.p3.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and adding it to this inequality we have</p>
            <equation xml:id="S2.Ex16">
              <Math mode="display" tex="(1+\beta){{\mathcal{A}}}^{LS}({{\mathbf{v}}},q;{{\mathbf{v}}},q)\geq(1-2C_{P}+%&#10;\beta)\|{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}+\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|^{2}_{0,%&#10;\alpha}+\frac{1}{2}\|\nabla q\|_{0,K}^{2}." text="(1 + beta) * A ^ (L * S) * vector@(v, q, v, q) &gt;= ((1 - 2 * C _ P) + beta) * (norm@(div@(v))) ^ 2 + ((norm@(v)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha)) + (1 / 2) * ((norm@(nabla@(q))) _ (list@(0, K))) ^ 2" xml:id="S2.Ex16.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Ex16.m1.10"/>

                          <XMDual>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
