        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" xml:id="S4.Thmremark2">
          <tags>
            <tag>Remark 4.2</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.2</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 4.2</tag>
          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 4.2</text></tag>.</title>
          <para xml:id="S4.Thmremark2.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">Note that <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{A}_{22}=A_{22}" text="(widetilde@(A)) _ 22 = A _ 22" xml:id="S4.Thmremark2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="22" role="NUMBER">22</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="22" role="NUMBER">22</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{N}_{2}=N_{2}" text="(widetilde@(N)) _ 2 = N _ 2" xml:id="S4.Thmremark2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{N}_{1}\geq N_{1}" text="(widetilde@(N)) _ 1 &gt;= N _ 1" xml:id="S4.Thmremark2.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>.</text></p>
          </para>
        </theorem>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2">
          <p>Next, let <Math mode="inline" tex="V={{\mathbb{R}}^{{N}}}" text="V = R ^ N" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{V}={{\mathbb{R}}^{{\widetilde{N}}}}" text="widetilde@(V) = R ^ (widetilde@(N))" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
define the surjective mapping <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi_{\widetilde{D}}:\widetilde{V}\rightarrow V" text="Pi _ (widetilde@(D)) colon widetilde@(V) rightarrow V" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="rightarrow" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> by</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:Pi" xml:id="S4.E13">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.13)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.13</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\Pi_{\widetilde{D}}=(R\widetilde{D}R^{T})^{-1}R\widetilde{D}," text="Pi _ (widetilde@(D)) = (R * widetilde@(D) * R ^ T) ^ (- 1) * R * widetilde@(D)" xml:id="S4.E13.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.E13.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.E13.m1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.E13.m1.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.E13.m1.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{D}" text="widetilde@(D)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a block-diagonal matrix, e.g.,
<!--  %**** String Line 1050 **** --></p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:tilde_D" xml:id="S4.E14">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.14)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.14</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\widetilde{D}=\left[\begin{array}[]{cc}\widetilde{D}_{11}&amp;0\\&#10;0&amp;I\end{array}\right]" text="widetilde@(D) = delimited-[]@(Array[[(widetilde@(D)) _ 11, 0], [0, I]])" xml:id="S4.E14.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.E14.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">[</XMTok>
                      <XMArray role="ARRAY" vattach="middle" xml:id="S4.E14.m1.1">
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                      </XMArray>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{D}_{11}=\widetilde{A}_{11}" text="(widetilde@(D)) _ 11 = (widetilde@(A)) _ 11" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> or
<Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{D}_{11}={\rm diag}(\widetilde{A}_{11})" text="(widetilde@(D)) _ 11 = diag * (widetilde@(A)) _ 11" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">diag</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p2.m6.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3">
          <p>Then let us consider the following fictitious-space two-grid preconditioner
<Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, which is implicitly defined via its inverse</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:two-grid_1" xml:id="S4.E15">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.15)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.15</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="C^{-1}=\Pi_{\widetilde{D}}\widetilde{A}^{-1}\Pi^{T}_{\widetilde{D}}." text="C ^ (- 1) = Pi _ (widetilde@(D)) * (widetilde@(A)) ^ (- 1) * (Pi ^ T) _ (widetilde@(D))" xml:id="S4.E15.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.E15.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.E15.m1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>The method of fictitious space preconditioning has first been proposed in
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="1985MatsokinA_NepomnyashchikhS-aa,Nepomnyaschikh1991mesh,nepomnyaschikh1995fictitious" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, and refined
in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Xu1996auxiliary" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> by adding an additional smoother. The
basis of the auxiliary space multigrid algorithm, is the following auxiliary
space two-grid preconditioner <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, which is implicitly defined via
its inverse</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:two-grid_3" xml:id="S4.E16">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.16)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.16</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="B^{-1}:=\overline{M}^{-1}+(I-M^{-T}A)C^{-1}(I-AM^{-1})" text="B ^ (- 1) assign (overline@(M)) ^ (- 1) + (I - M ^ (- T) * A) * C ^ (- 1) * (I - A * M ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S4.E16.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>

                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.E16.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.E16.m1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is defined according to (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:two-grid_1"/>), the operator <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
denotes an <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-norm convergent smoother, i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="\|I-M^{-1}A\|_{A}&lt;1" text="(norm@(I - M ^ (- 1) * A)) _ A less 1" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m7.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m7.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
and <Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{M}=M(M+M^{T}-A)^{-1}M^{T}" text="overline@(M) = M * ((M + M ^ T) - A) ^ (- 1) * M ^ T" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p3.m8.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the corresponding symmetrized
smoother. Examples of such smoothers include the Gauss-Seidel smoother and
the damped Jacobi smoother and are well known.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4">
          <p>Below in Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:KLM"/>
we present an estimate for the condition number under the following assumptions:</p>
          <itemize xml:id="S4.I1">
            <item xml:id="S4.I1.ix1">
              <tags>
                <tag>(i)</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item (i)</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1">
                <p>the smoother <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> satisfies
for all <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bf{{v}}}}\in V={{\mathbb{R}}^{{N}}}" text="v element-of V = R ^ N" xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>:</p>
                <equation labels="LABEL:eq:eb_1" xml:id="S4.E17">
                  <tags>

                  </tags>

                <p>and</p>
                <equation labels="LABEL:eq:eb_2" xml:id="S4.E18">
                  <tags>
                    <tag>(4.18)</tag>
                    <tag role="refnum">4.18</tag>
                  </tags>
                  <Math mode="display" tex="\|M^{-T}A{{\bf{{v}}}}\|^{2}\leq\frac{\eta}{\rho_{A}}\|{{\bf{{v}}}}\|_{A}^{2},\quad" text="(norm@(M ^ (- T) * A * v)) ^ 2 less= (eta / rho _ A) * ((norm@(v)) _ A) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.E18.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.E18.m1.2"/>

                                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>

                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>

                                <XMApp>

                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>

                                <XMApp>

                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.E18.m1.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E18.m1.1">v</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>
                </equation>
                <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{A}=\lambda_{\max}(A)" text="rho _ A = lambda _ maximum * A" xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m3">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">max</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m3.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m3.1">A</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> denotes the spectral radius of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m4">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="\eta" text="eta" xml:id="S4.I1.ix1.p1.m5">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> is a non-negative constant;<break/></p>
              </para>
            </item>
            <item xml:id="S4.I1.ix2">
              <tags>
                <tag>(ii)</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item (ii)</tag>
              </tags>

          <p>Note that due to <Math mode="inline" tex="\|\Pi^{\star}\Pi\|=\|\Pi\Pi^{\star}\|" text="norm@(Pi ^ star * Pi) = norm@(Pi * Pi ^ star)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="star" role="MULOP">⋆</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m1.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="star" role="MULOP">⋆</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, the bound (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:eb_3"/>)
is equivalent to
<Math mode="inline" tex="\|\Pi^{\star}{{\bf{{v}}}}\|_{\widetilde{A}}^{2}\leq c_{\Pi}\|{{\bf{{v}}}}\|_{A%&#10;}^{2}" text="((norm@(Pi ^ star * v)) _ (widetilde@(A))) ^ 2 less= c _ Pi * ((norm@(v)) _ A) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m2.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="star" role="MULOP">⋆</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m2.1">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
for all <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bf{{v}}}}\in V" text="v element-of V" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi^{\star}=\widetilde{A}^{-1}\Pi^{T}A" text="Pi ^ star = (widetilde@(A)) ^ (- 1) * Pi ^ T * A" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="star" role="MULOP">⋆</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
denotes the operator satisfying the identity
<Math mode="inline" tex="\langle\Pi\tilde{{{\bf{{u}}}}},{{\bf{{v}}}}\rangle_{A}=\langle\tilde{{{\bf{{u}%&#10;}}}},\Pi^{\star}{{\bf{{v}}}}\rangle_{\widetilde{A}}" text="(list@(Pi * tilde@(u), v)) _ A = (list@(tilde@(u), Pi ^ star * v)) _ (widetilde@(A))" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.1">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.2">
                          <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m5.4">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="star" role="MULOP">⋆</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{{{\bf{{u}}}}}\in\widetilde{V},{{\bf{{v}}}}\in V" text="formulae@(tilde@(u) element-of widetilde@(V), v element-of V)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m6.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p4.m6.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" xml:id="S4.Thmremark3">
          <tags>
            <tag>Remark 4.3</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.3</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 4.3</tag>
          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 4.3</text></tag>.</title>
          <para xml:id="S4.Thmremark3.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">While the results stated here provide uniform bounds on the condition
numbers of the preconditioned systems, it is also straightforward to
state similar results for a convergent iterative method. Indeed,
if, for a large enough scaling parameter <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau" text="tau" xml:id="S4.Thmremark3.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, we set
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{-1}=\tau\Pi_{\widetilde{D}}\widetilde{A}^{-1}\Pi^{T}_{\widetilde{D}}" text="C ^ (- 1) = tau * Pi _ (widetilde@(D)) * (widetilde@(A)) ^ (- 1) * (Pi ^ T) _ (widetilde@(D))" xml:id="S4.Thmremark3.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
<!--  %**** String Line 1125 **** -->                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="upright" name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, then
it holds that the related stationary iterative method is <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.Thmremark3.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>-norm
convergent, namely, <Math mode="inline" tex="\|I-C^{-1}A\|_{A}&lt;1" text="(norm@(I - C ^ (- 1) * A)) _ A less 1" xml:id="S4.Thmremark3.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Thmremark3.p1.m4.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmremark3.p1.m4.1">
                              <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>. To keep the
presentation focused on preconditioning, however, we only consider
<Math mode="inline" tex="\tau=1" text="tau = 1" xml:id="S4.Thmremark3.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>.</text></p>
          </para>
        </theorem>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p5">
          <p>We are now ready to state the theorem (see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Kraus_Lymb_Mar_2014" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>)
which gives the condition number estimate.</p>
        </para>
        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_theorem" inlist="thm theorem:theorem" labels="LABEL:thm:KLM" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1">
          <tags>
            <tag>Theorem 4.1</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 4.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 4.1</text></tag> (Condition number estimate <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Kraus_Lymb_Mar_2014" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>).</title>
          <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">Under the assumptions (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:eb_1"/>)–(<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:eb_3"/>) the two-grid preconditioner <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
defined in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:two-grid_3"/>) and (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:two-grid_1"/>) satisfies</text></p>
            <equation labels="LABEL:eq:eb_7" xml:id="S4.E21">
              <tags>
                <tag>(4.21)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">4.21</tag>
              </tags>
              <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{\underline{c}}{\underline{c}+\eta}\leq\lambda_{\min}(B^{-1}A)\leq\lambda%&#10;(B^{-1}A)\leq\lambda_{\max}(B^{-1}A)\leq\bar{c}+c_{\Pi}," text="underline@(c) / (underline@(c) + eta) less= lambda _ minimum * B ^ (- 1) * A less= lambda * B ^ (- 1) * A less= lambda _ maximum * B ^ (- 1) * A less= bar@(c) + c _ Pi" xml:id="S4.E21.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E21.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E21.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.E21.m1.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.E21.m1.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.E21.m1.1.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.E21.m1.1.2">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">max</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.E21.m1.1.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.E21.m1.1.3">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
            <p><text font="italic">that is, <Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa(B^{-1}A)\leq(\bar{c}+c_{\Pi})(\underline{c}+\eta)/\underline{c}" text="kappa * B ^ (- 1) * A less= ((bar@(c) + c _ Pi) * (underline@(c) + eta)) / underline@(c)" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2.2">
                                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2.3">
                                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>.</text></p>
          </para>
        </theorem>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p6">
          <p>Next, we note that if no
smoothing is applied, i.e. <Math mode="inline" tex="B=C" text="B = C" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS1.p6.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then the condition number estimate
provided in Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:KLM"/> also holds and we have the
following result.
<!--  %**** String Line 1150 **** --></p>
        </para>
        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_corollary" inlist="thm theorem:corollary" xml:id="S4.Thmcorollary1">
          <tags>
            <tag>Corollary 4.1</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 4.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 4.1</text></tag>.</title>
          <para xml:id="S4.Thmcorollary1.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">If <Math mode="inline" tex="B=C" text="B = C" xml:id="S4.Thmcorollary1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and under the assumptions of
Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:KLM"/> we have the estimate</text></p>
            <equation labels="LABEL:eq:pi" xml:id="S4.E22">
              <tags>
                <tag>(4.22)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">4.22</tag>
              </tags>
              <Math mode="display" tex="\kappa(B^{-1}A)\leq c_{\Pi}=c=\|\pi_{\widetilde{D}}\|^{2}_{\widetilde{A}},%&#10;\quad\mbox{where}\quad\pi_{\widetilde{D}}:=R^{T}\Pi_{\widetilde{D}}." text="formulae@(kappa * B ^ (- 1) * A less= c _ Pi = c = ((norm@(pi _ (widetilde@(D)))) ^ 2) _ (widetilde@(A)), list@([where], pi _ (widetilde@(D))) assign R ^ T * Pi _ (widetilde@(D)))" xml:id="S4.E22.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E22.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S4.E22.m1.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.E22.m1.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.E22.m1.2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.E22.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                            <XMApp>

          </para>
        </theorem>
      </subsubsection>
      <subsubsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec:asmg" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2">
        <tags>
          <tag>4.3.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.3.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">§4.3.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title><tag close=". ">4.3.2</tag>Auxiliary space multigrid method</title>
        <toctitle><tag close=" ">4.3.2</tag>Auxiliary space multigrid method</toctitle>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1">
          <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="k=0,1,\dots,\ell-1" text="k = list@(0, 1, dots, ell - 1)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.2">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.3">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m1.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the index of mesh refinement where <Math mode="inline" tex="k=0" text="k = 0" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> corresponds
to the finest mesh, i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="A^{(0)}:=A_{h}=A" text="A ^ 0 assign A _ h = A" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m3.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> denotes the fine-grid matrix. Consider
the sequence of auxiliary space stiffness matrices <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{A}^{(k)}" text="(widetilde@(A)) ^ k" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m4.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
in the two-by-two block factorized form</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:factorizationK" xml:id="S4.E23">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.23)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.23</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="({\widetilde{A}}^{(k)})^{-1}=(\widetilde{L}^{(k)})^{T}\widetilde{D}^{(k)}%&#10;\widetilde{L}^{(k)}," text="(widetilde@(A)) ^ k ^ (- 1) = (widetilde@(L)) ^ k ^ T * (widetilde@(D)) ^ k * (widetilde@(L)) ^ k" xml:id="S4.E23.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.E23.m1.5"/>

                        </XMDual>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.E23.m1.5.2"/>

                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                  <XMRef idref="S4.E23.m1.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E23.m1.2">k</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.E23.m1.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E23.m1.4">k</XMTok>

              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>

            <Math mode="display" tex="\widetilde{L}^{(k)}=\left[\begin{array}[]{cc}I&amp;\\&#10;-\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{21}(\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{11})^{-1}&amp;I\end{array}\right],%&#10;\quad\widetilde{D}^{(k)}=\left[\begin{array}[]{cc}(\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{11})^{%&#10;-1}&amp;\\&#10;&amp;{Q^{(k)}}^{-1}\end{array}\right]" text="formulae@((widetilde@(L)) ^ k = delimited-[]@(Array[[I, ], [- ((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 21 * (((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 11) ^ (- 1), I]]), (widetilde@(D)) ^ k = delimited-[]@(Array[[(((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 11) ^ (- 1), ], [, Q ^ k ^ (- 1)]]))" xml:id="S4.E24.m1">

                                  <XMDual>
