                                            <XMRef idref="S4.E24.m1.6"/>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E24.m1.6">k</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMCell>
                              <XMCell/>
                            </XMRow>
                            <XMRow>
                              <XMCell/>
                              <XMCell align="center">
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.E24.m1.8"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E24.m1.8">k</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMCell>
                            </XMRow>
                          </XMArray>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and
the additive Schur complement approximation <Math mode="inline" tex="Q^{(k)}" text="Q ^ k" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p1.m5.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> defines the next coarser level matrix, i.e.</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:factorizationK2" xml:id="S4.E25">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.25)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.25</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="A^{(k+1)}:=Q^{(k)}." text="A ^ (k + 1) assign Q ^ k" xml:id="S4.E25.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.E25.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.E25.m1.3">

                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.E25.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.E25.m1.1">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.E25.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E25.m1.2">k</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2">
          <p>The algebraic multilevel iteration (AMLI)-cycle auxiliary space multigrid (ASMG) preconditioner
<Math mode="inline" tex="B^{(k)}" text="B ^ k" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m1.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
approximating <Math mode="inline" tex="A^{(k)}" text="A ^ k" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m2.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is defined on all levels <Math mode="inline" tex="k&lt;\ell" text="k less ell" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> via the following relations
(see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Kraus_Lymb_Mar_2014" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>)</p>

          <equation xml:id="S4.E27">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.27)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.27</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\overline{D}^{(k)}:=\left[\begin{array}[]{cc}(\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{11})^{-1}&amp;%&#10;\\&#10;&amp;B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}\end{array}\right]" text="(overline@(D)) ^ k assign delimited-[]@(Array[[(((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 11) ^ (- 1), ], [, (B _ nu) ^ (k + 1)]])" xml:id="S4.E27.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>

                      <XMArray role="ARRAY" vattach="middle" xml:id="S4.E27.m1.5">
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMDual>

                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              </XMDual>

                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell/>
                        </XMRow>
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell/>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.E27.m1.4"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.E27.m1.4">
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                      </XMArray>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}" text="(B _ nu) ^ (k + 1)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m4.1">
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
is an approximation of the inverse of the coarse-level matrix,
i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}\approx{A^{(k+1)}}^{-1}" text="(B _ nu) ^ (k + 1) approximately-equals A ^ (k + 1) ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m5.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m5.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p2.m5.2">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.E28">
            <tags>

          </equation>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3">
          <p>In the linear AMLI-cycle <Math mode="inline" tex="B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}" text="(B _ nu) ^ (k + 1)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m1.1">
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a polynomial approximation of <Math mode="inline" tex="{A^{(k+1)}}^{-1}" text="A ^ (k + 1) ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m2.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
i.e.</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex7">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{array}[]{ccc}B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}&amp;:=&amp;(I-p^{(k)}({B^{(k+1)}}^{-1}A^{(k+1)})){%&#10;A^{(k+1)}}^{-1}\\&#10;&amp;=:&amp;q^{(k)}({B^{(k+1)}}^{-1}A^{(k+1)})){B^{(k+1)}}^{-1}\end{array}" text="Array[[(B _ nu) ^ (k + 1), assign, (I - p ^ k * B ^ (k + 1) ^ (- 1) * A ^ (k + 1)) * A ^ (k + 1) ^ (- 1)], [, absent = colon, [q(k)(B(+k1)-1A(+k1)))B(+k1)-1]]]" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1">

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMArg>
                    </XMCell>
                  </XMRow>
                </XMArray>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>that requires the action of <Math mode="inline" tex="{B^{(k+1)}}^{-1}" text="B ^ (k + 1) ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m3.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. The classical choice of <Math mode="inline" tex="p^{(k)}(t)" text="p ^ k * t" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m4.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m4.2">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
is a scaled and shifted Chebyshev polynomial of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu_{k}=\nu" text="nu _ k = nu" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> where</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex8">
            <Math mode="display" tex="p^{(k)}(0)=1,\qquad q^{(k)}(t):=\frac{1-p^{(k)}(t)}{t}\approx\frac{1}{t}." text="formulae@(p ^ k * 0 = 1, q ^ k * t assign (1 - p ^ k * t) / t approximately-equals 1 / t)" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.7"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.7">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.7.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.1">k</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.5"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.5">0</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.7.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.2"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.2">k</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.6"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.6">t</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.3"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.3">k</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex8.m1.4"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1.4">t</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Other polynomial approximations are possible, e.g., choosing <Math mode="inline" tex="q^{(k)}(t)" text="q ^ k * t" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m6.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m6.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m6.2">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to be the
best approximation to <Math mode="inline" tex="1/t" text="1 / t" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p3.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in uniform norm, see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Kraus2012polynomial" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4">
          <p>In case of the nonlinear AMLI-cycle ASMG method</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex9">
            <Math mode="display" tex="B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}=B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}[\cdot]" text="(B _ nu) ^ (k + 1) = (B _ nu) ^ (k + 1) * delimited-[]@(cdot)" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex9.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex9.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.2">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex9.m1.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.3">⋅</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>is a nonlinear mapping whose action on a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bf{{d}}}}" text="d" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is realized by <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
iterations of a preconditioned Krylov subspace method.
In the following the generalized conjugate gradient method will serve this
purpose and hence we denote <Math mode="inline" tex="B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}[\cdot]=B^{(k+1)}_{{\rm GCG,\nu}}[\cdot]" text="(B _ nu) ^ (k + 1) * delimited-[]@(cdot) = (B ^ (k + 1)) _ (list@(GCG, nu)) * delimited-[]@(cdot)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.1">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.5">⋅</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.2">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.3">GCG</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.4">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.6"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p4.m3.6">⋅</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5">
          <p>An important step in the construction is that performing <Math mode="inline" tex="B_{\nu}^{(k+1)}[\cdot]" text="(B _ nu) ^ (k + 1) * delimited-[]@(cdot)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m1.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m1.2">⋅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
one applies (<ref labelref="LABEL:multigrid_preconditioner"/>) also for preconditioning at level <Math mode="inline" tex="(k+1)" text="k + 1" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS2.p5.m2.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Hence, (<ref labelref="LABEL:multigrid_preconditioner"/>) becomes a nonlinear operator, too–we will
therefore write</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex10">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{B^{(k)}}^{-1}={B^{(k)}}^{-1}[\cdot],\quad\mbox{for all }k&lt;\ell." text="formulae@(B ^ k ^ (- 1) = B ^ k ^ (- 1) * delimited-[]@(cdot), [for all ] * k less ell)" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.4">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.4.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.1">k</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.2">k</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.3"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.3">⋅</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.4.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMText>for all </XMText>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
        </para>
      </subsubsection>
      <subsubsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec:algorithms" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3">
        <tags>
          <tag>4.3.3</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.3.3</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">§4.3.3</tag>
        </tags>
        <title><tag close=". ">4.3.3</tag>Nonlinear ASMG algorithms</title>
        <toctitle><tag close=" ">4.3.3</tag>Nonlinear ASMG algorithms</toctitle>
<!--  %**** String Line 1250 **** -->        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p1">
          <p>In the remainder of this section we will present two variants of nonlinear ASMG algorithms
for preconditioning the SPD matrices arising from discretization of the weighted bilinear form
(<ref labelref="LABEL:WH-div-prod"/>)
and comment on some details of their implementation in the specific situation of using
lowest-order Raviart-Thomas elements on rectangles.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p2">
          <p>On Figure <ref labelref="LABEL:fig:covering"/> we give an illustration of the <text font="italic">covering of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\Omega}" text="Omega" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p2.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math></text> by
overlapping subdomains, these are <Math mode="inline" tex="9" text="9" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="9" role="NUMBER">9</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> staggered subdomains each of size <Math mode="inline" tex="1/2" text="1 / 2" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of the
original domain <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega" text="Omega" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>

              </Math> of DOF</text>. We illustrate it in case of two grids
coarse, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{T}}_{H}" text="T _ H" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p3.m2">

Since in the setting of the lowest-order Raviart-Thomas finite elements it is not immediately
clear how to partition <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{D}" text="D" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p3.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we perform a preprocessing step which consists
of a <text font="italic">compatible two-level basis transformation</text>, see e.g. <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Kraus_12" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.
<!--  %**** String Line 1275 **** -->The global matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p3.m10">

              </XMath>
            </Math> is transformed
according to</p>

          </equation>
          <p>where the transformation matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p3.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the product of a permutation matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="P" text="P" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p3.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and another
transformation matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="J_{\pm}" text="J _ plus-or-minus" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p3.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, i.e.</p>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p4">
          <p>The permutation <Math mode="inline" tex="P" text="P" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p4.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> allows us to provide
a two-level numbering of the DOF that splits them into two groups,
the first one consisting of DOF associated with fine-grid edges that are not part of
any coarse-grid edge
(interior DOF) and the second one keeping all remaining DOF ordered such that any two that are
on one edge have consecutive numbers. The transformation matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="J_{\pm}" text="J _ plus-or-minus" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p4.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:transformation_J"/>)
is of the form</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex11">
            <Math mode="display" tex="J_{\pm}=\left[\begin{array}[]{cc}I&amp;\\&#10;&amp;J_{22}\end{array}\right],\quad\mbox{where}\quad I\in{\mathbb{R}}^{(4|{%&#10;\mathcal{T}_{H}}|)\times(4|{\mathcal{T}_{H}}|)}," text="formulae@(J _ plus-or-minus = list@(delimited-[]@(Array[[I, ], [, J _ 22]]), [where]), I element-of R ^ (4 * absolute-value@(T _ H) * 4 * absolute-value@(T _ H)))" xml:id="S4.Ex11.m1">

          <p><Math mode="inline" tex="J_{22}" text="J _ 22" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p4.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </Math> has the form</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex12">

        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5">
          <p>The analogous transformation is performed on a local level on each subdomain <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{i}" text="Omega _ i" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, i.e.</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:A_i_hat" xml:id="S4.E31">
            <tags>
              <tag>(4.31)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">4.31</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\widehat{A}_{i}=J^{T}_{i}A_{i}J_{i}," text="(widehat@(A)) _ i = (J ^ T) _ i * A _ i * J _ i" xml:id="S4.E31.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.E31.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.E31.m1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>where again <Math mode="inline" tex="J_{i}=P_{i}J_{\pm,i}" text="J _ i = P _ i * J _ (list@(plus-or-minus, i))" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m2.1">±</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m2.2">i</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{i}" text="P _ i" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the permutation explained above but performed
on the degrees of freedom in the subdomain <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{i}" text="Omega _ i" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="J_{\pm,i}" text="J _ (list@(plus-or-minus, i))" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m5.1">±</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m5.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has the
same meaning but restricted to the subdomain <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{i}" text="Omega _ i" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p5.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_definition" inlist="thm theorem:definition" xml:id="S4.Thmdefinition2">
          <tags>
            <tag>Definition 4.2</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.2</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 4.2</tag>
          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 4.2</text></tag>.</title>
          <para xml:id="S4.Thmdefinition2.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">The global and local transformations will be called compatible if</text></p>
            <equation labels="LABEL:eq:compatibility1" xml:id="S4.E32">
              <tags>
                <tag>(4.32)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">4.32</tag>
              </tags>
              <Math mode="display" tex="\widehat{A}=J^{T}AJ=\sum_{i=1}^{n_{\mathcal{G}}}\widehat{R}_{i}^{T}\widehat{A}%&#10;_{i}\widehat{R}_{i}" text="widehat@(A) = J ^ T * A * J = ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ (n _ G))@(((widehat@(R)) _ i) ^ T * (widehat@(A)) _ i * (widehat@(R)) _ i)" xml:id="S4.E32.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
            <p><text font="italic">which is equivalent to</text></p>
            <equation labels="LABEL:eq:compatibility2" xml:id="S4.E33">
              <tags>
                <tag>(4.33)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">4.33</tag>
              </tags>
              <Math mode="display" tex="R_{i}J=J_{i}\widehat{R}_{i}." text="R _ i * J = J _ i * (widehat@(R)) _ i" xml:id="S4.E33.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.E33.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E33.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
          </para>
        </theorem>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p6">
          <p>The introduced transformation matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p6.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> defines the splitting of the DOF into coarse and fine, namely
the FDOF correspond to the set of interior DOF and half differences on the coarse edges while the
CDOF correspond to the half sums on the coarse edges.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p7">
          <p>Finally we formulate the following two algorithms (variants of nonlinear ASMG)
for solving linear systems with the matrix <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p7.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> resulting from discretization
of (<ref labelref="LABEL:WH-div-prod"/>).</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p8">
          <p>The first algorithm applies the nonlinear ASMG method in the two-level basis, i.e.,
all matrices <Math mode="inline" tex="A^{(k)}" text="A ^ k" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p8.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.SSS3.p8.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p8.m1.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are transformed into two-level basis, i.e.,</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex13">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\widehat{A}^{(k)}={J^{(k)}}^{T}A^{(k)}J^{(k)},\quad\mbox{for all }k&lt;\ell" text="formulae@((widehat@(A)) ^ k = J ^ k ^ T * A ^ k * J ^ k, [for all ] * k less ell)" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.1">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.2">k</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.3">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex13.m1.4"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.4">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex13.m1.6">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMText>for all </XMText>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and also the smoothing is performed in the two-level basis, i.e., using <Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{M}" text="widehat@(M)" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p8.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
instead of <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S4.SS3.SSS3.p8.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <theorem class="ltx_theorem_algorithm" inlist="thm theorem:algorithm" labels="LABEL:algorithm1" xml:id="S4.Thmalgorithm1">
          <tags>
            <tag>Algorithm 4.1</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">Algorithm 4.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Algorithm 4.1</text></tag>.</title>
          <para xml:id="S4.Thmalgorithm1.p1">
            <p><text font="italic">Nonlinear ASMG method–Variant I: Action of (<ref labelref="LABEL:multigrid_preconditioner"/>)
<!--  %**** String Line 1350 **** -->on a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{{{\bf{{d}}}}}" text="widehat@(d)" xml:id="S4.Thmalgorithm1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> <break/>

                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td align="left" thead="row">Pre-smoothing:</td>
                      <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{{{\bf{{u}}}}}=(\widehat{M}^{(k)})^{-1}\widehat{{{\bf{{d}}}}}" text="widehat@(u) = (widehat@(M)) ^ k ^ (- 1) * widehat@(d)" xml:id="S4.Thmalgorithm1.p1.m2">

                            <XMApp>

                      <td align="left" thead="row">Auxiliary space correction:</td>
                      <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\left\{\begin{array}[]{l}\left(\begin{array}[]{c}\tilde{{{\bf{{q}}}}}_{1}\\&#10;\tilde{{{\bf{{q}}}}}_{2}\end{array}\right):=\tilde{{{\bf{{q}}}}}=\Pi_{%&#10;\widetilde{D}^{(k)}}^{T}(\widehat{{{\bf{{d}}}}}-\widehat{A}^{(k)}\widehat{{{%&#10;\bf{{u}}}}})\\&#10;\tilde{{{\bf{{p}}}}}_{1}=(\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{11})^{-1}\tilde{{{\bf{{q}}}}}_{%&#10;1}\\&#10;\tilde{{{\bf{{p}}}}}_{2}={J^{(k+1)}}B^{(k+1)}_{{\rm GCG,\nu}}[{J^{(k+1)}}^{T}(%&#10;\tilde{{{\bf{{q}}}}}_{2}-\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{21}\tilde{{{\bf{{p}}}}}_{1})]\\&#10;\tilde{{{\bf{{q}}}}}_{1}=\tilde{{{\bf{{p}}}}}_{1}-(\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{11})^{%&#10;-1}\widetilde{A}^{(k)}_{12}\tilde{{{\bf{{p}}}}}_{2}\\&#10;\tilde{{{\bf{{q}}}}}_{2}=\tilde{{{\bf{{p}}}}}_{2}\\&#10;\widehat{{{\bf{{v}}}}}=\widehat{{{\bf{{u}}}}}+\Pi_{\widetilde{D}^{(k)}}\tilde{%&#10;{{\bf{{q}}}}}\end{array}\right." text="cases@(Array[[Array[[(tilde@(q)) _ 1], [(tilde@(q)) _ 2]] assign tilde@(q) = (Pi _ ((widetilde@(D)) ^ k)) ^ T * (widehat@(d) - (widehat@(A)) ^ k * widehat@(u))], [(tilde@(p)) _ 1 = (((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 11) ^ (- 1) * (tilde@(q)) _ 1], [(tilde@(p)) _ 2 = J ^ (k + 1) * (B ^ (k + 1)) _ (list@(GCG, nu)) * delimited-[]@(J ^ (k + 1) ^ T * ((tilde@(q)) _ 2 - ((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 21 * (tilde@(p)) _ 1))], [(tilde@(q)) _ 1 = (tilde@(p)) _ 1 - (((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 11) ^ (- 1) * ((widetilde@(A)) ^ k) _ 12 * (tilde@(p)) _ 2], [(tilde@(q)) _ 2 = (tilde@(p)) _ 2], [widehat@(v) = widehat@(u) + Pi _ ((widetilde@(D)) ^ k) * tilde@(q)]])" xml:id="S4.Thmalgorithm1.p1.m3">
                          <XMath>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="cases"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Thmalgorithm1.p1.m3.18"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="true">{</XMTok>
                                <XMArray role="ARRAY" vattach="middle" xml:id="S4.Thmalgorithm1.p1.m3.18">
                                  <XMRow>
                                    <XMCell align="left">
                                      <XMApp>

                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmalgorithm1.p1.m3.3"/>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="true">(</XMTok>

                                              <XMRow>
                                                <XMCell align="center">
                                                  <XMApp>
                                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post21"/>
                                                    <XMApp>
                                                      <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>

                                                  <XMApp>

                                                    <XMApp>
                                                      <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>

                                            </XMArray>
                                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">)</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
