                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.E2.m1.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E2.m1.1">T</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.E2.m1.3.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="A1.E2.m1.3.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{d}" text="c _ d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a constant depending only on the spatial dimension <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and is chosen so that <Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{e}{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\cdot{{\mathbf{n}}}_{e}=1" text="(integral _ e)@(psi _ e cdot n _ e) = 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 2075 **** --></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS1.p3">
        <p>We note that explicit formulas similar to (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:RT-basis"/>)
are available also for the case of lowest order
Raviart-Thomas-Nédélec  elements on <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dimensional cuboids
(parallelograms or rectangular parallelepipeds). Indeed, if a
cuboidal element <Math mode="inline" tex="T\in\mathcal{T}_{h}" text="T element-of T _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is with faces
parallel to the coordinate planes, this can be seen as
follows. We denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{\psi}}}_{k}^{\pm}" text="(psi _ k) ^ plus-or-minus" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the basis function which
corresponds to a face <Math mode="inline" tex="F_{k}^{\pm}" text="(F _ k) ^ plus-or-minus" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with outward normal vector
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pm{{\mathbf{e}}}_{k}" text="plus-or-minus e _ k" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="k=1,\ldots,d" text="k = list@(1, ldots, d)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m6.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m6.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m6.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m6.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m6.3">d</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Here, <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{e}}}_{k}" text="e _ k" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-th coordinate
vector in <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{R}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{x}}}_{M,k}^{\pm}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}" text="(x _ (list@(M, k))) ^ plus-or-minus element-of R ^ d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m10.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m10.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m10.1">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m10.2">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the mass center of
the face <Math mode="inline" tex="F_{k}^{\pm}" text="(F _ k) ^ plus-or-minus" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="k=1,\ldots,d" text="k = list@(1, ldots, d)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m12.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m12.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m12.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m12.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m12.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m12.3">d</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We then have</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:RT-basis-cube" xml:id="A1.E3">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.3)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">A.3</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="{{\bm{\psi}}}_{k}^{\pm}({{\mathbf{x}}})=\frac{({{\mathbf{x}}}-{{\mathbf{x}}}_{%&#10;M,k}^{\mp})^{T}{{\mathbf{e}}}_{k}}{|T|}{{\mathbf{e}}}_{k}." text="(psi _ k) ^ plus-or-minus * x = (((x - (x _ (list@(M, k))) ^ minus-or-plus) ^ T * e _ k) / absolute-value@(T)) * e _ k" xml:id="A1.E3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="A1.E3.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="A1.E3.m1.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.E3.m1.5"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E3.m1.5">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.E3.m1.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.E3.m1.3">
                                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="A1.E3.m1.1"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="A1.E3.m1.2"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E3.m1.1">M</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E3.m1.2">k</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus-or-plus" name="mp" role="ADDOP">∓</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.E3.m1.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E3.m1.4">T</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Here for simplicity we have used the notation <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{x}}}^{T}{{\mathbf{e}}}_{k}" text="x ^ T * e _ k" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for the standard Euclidean inner
product of vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{x}}},{{\mathbf{e}}}_{k}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}" text="list@(x, e _ k) element-of R ^ d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m14.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m14.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m14.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m14.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. From this formula we see that over
the finite element <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the basis functions
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{\psi}}}_{k}^{\pm}({{\mathbf{x}}})" text="(psi _ k) ^ plus-or-minus * x" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p3.m16.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m16.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are linear of the variable <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{k}" text="x _ k" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and constant in the
remaining variables in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p3.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS1.p4">
        <p>These are exactly <Math mode="inline" tex="2d" text="2 * d" xml:id="A1.SS1.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> basis functions satisfying</p>
        <equation xml:id="A1.Ex2">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\int_{F_{j}^{\pm}}{{\bm{\psi}}}_{k}^{+}\cdot{{\mathbf{n}}}_{F^{\pm}_{j}}=\int_%&#10;{F_{k}^{-}}{{\bm{\psi}}}_{k}^{+}\cdot{{\mathbf{n}}}_{F^{-}_{k}}=0,\;\mbox{for}%&#10;\;j\neq k,\;\;\mbox{and}\;\int_{F_{k}^{+}}{{\bm{\psi}}}_{k}^{+}\cdot{{\mathbf{%&#10;n}}}_{F^{+}_{k}}=1." text="formulae@((integral _ ((F _ j) ^ plus-or-minus))@((psi _ k) ^ + cdot n _ (F ^ plus-or-minus) _ j) = (integral _ ((F _ k) ^ -))@((psi _ k) ^ + cdot n _ (F ^ -) _ k) = 0, formulae@([for] * j not-equals k, [and] * (integral _ ((F _ k) ^ +))@((psi _ k) ^ + cdot n _ (F ^ +) _ k) = 1))" xml:id="A1.Ex2.m1">

        </equation>
        <p>with a similar relation for <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{\psi}}}_{k}^{-}" text="(psi _ k) ^ -" xml:id="A1.SS1.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="k=1,\ldots,d" text="k = list@(1, ldots, d)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p4.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p4.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p4.m3.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS1.p4.m3.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="A1.SS1.p4.m3.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p4.m3.3">d</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We note that all numerical experiments in the
subsequent sections were done using these finite elements.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS1.p5">
        <p>These
simple formulas also show that on a shape regular mesh we have:</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:scaling" xml:id="A1.E4">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.4)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">A.4</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|_{0,T}^{2}\sim h_{e}^{2-d},\quad h_{e}=\operatorname{diam%&#10;}(e),\quad\quad T^{+}\cap T^{-}=e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}." text="formulae@(((norm@(psi _ e)) _ (list@(0, T))) ^ 2 similar-to (h _ e) ^ (2 - d), formulae@(h _ e = diam@(e), T ^ + intersection T ^ - = e element-of E _ h))" xml:id="A1.E4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="A1.E4.m1.5">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.E4.m1.5.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="similar-to" name="sim" role="RELOP">∼</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.5.1.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.E4.m1.5.1.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.E4.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E4.m1.2">T</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="A1.E4.m1.5.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.5.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.5.2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="A1.E4.m1.5.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.3"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E4.m1.4"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="A1.E4.m1.3">diam</XMTok>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E4.m1.4">e</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="A1.E4.m1.5.2.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>The constants in the norm equivalence in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:scaling"/>)
depend on the shape of the finite elements, but not on the
contrast <Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="A1.SS1.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS1.p6">
        <p>We treat Dirichlet, Neumann boundary conditions (or mixture of these)
in a unified fashion. In order to do this we set <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to
denote the set of faces (edges) of <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{T}_{h}" text="T _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> minus the set of
faces (edges) on which we have Neumann conditions
and <Math mode="inline" tex="|\mathcal{E}_{h}|" text="absolute-value@(E _ h)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m3.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m3.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the number of these edges/faces. Thus, in the case of pure
Neumann conditions on <Math mode="inline" tex="\partial\Omega" text="partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the set of faces (edges) <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is the set of interior faces (edges). Further, <Math mode="inline" tex="W_{h}" text="W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the space of all
piece-wise constant scalar valued functions with zero mean value over <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega" text="Omega" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, namely,
<Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{\Omega}q=0" text="(integral _ Omega)@(q) = 0" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In the case of pure Dirichlet conditions, <Math mode="inline" tex="W_{h}" text="W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is
<!--  %**** String Line 2125 **** -->the space of piece-wise constants (without restriction) and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the set of all faces (edges) in <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{T}_{h}" text="T _ h" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" xml:id="A1.SS2">
      <tags>
        <tag>A.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">A.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§A.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=". ">A.2</tag>Scalar products and discrete gradients</title>
      <toctitle><tag close=" ">A.2</tag>Scalar products and discrete gradients</toctitle>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS2.p1">
        <p>We now define a weighted scalar product on <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}" text="V _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>: For a vector of
weights <Math mode="inline" tex="\omega\in\mathbb{R}^{|\mathcal{E}_{h}|}" text="omega element-of R ^ (absolute-value@(E _ h))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m2.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m2.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we set</p>
        <equation xml:id="A1.Ex3">
          <Math mode="display" tex="({{\mathbf{u}}},{{\mathbf{v}}})_{*,\omega}=\sum_{e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}}\omega_{e%&#10;}\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}})\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{v}}})\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}%&#10;,\quad({{\mathbf{u}}},{{\mathbf{v}}})_{*,1}=\sum_{e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}}\sigma_{%&#10;e}({{\mathbf{u}}})\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{v}}})\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}." text="formulae@((open-interval@(u, v)) _ (list@(*, omega)) = (sum _ (e element-of E _ h))@(omega _ e * sigma _ e * u * sigma _ e * v * (norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2), (open-interval@(u, v)) _ (list@(*, 1)) = (sum _ (e element-of E _ h))@(sigma _ e * u * sigma _ e * v * (norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2))" xml:id="A1.Ex3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="A1.Ex3.m1.13"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="A1.Ex3.m1.13">
                    <XMApp>

                          <XMDual>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex3.m1.5">u</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex3.m1.6">v</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Note that <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbf{u}}},{{\mathbf{v}}})_{*,1}" text="(open-interval@(u, v)) _ (list@(*, 1))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m3.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m3.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m3.3">u</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m3.4">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m3.1">*</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m3.2">1</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an inner product for which
<Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{e}=1" text="omega _ e = 1" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The corresponding norms are
denoted by <Math mode="inline" tex="\|\cdot\|_{*,\omega}" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m6.1">*</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m6.2">ω</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\|\cdot\|_{*,1}" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m7.1">*</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m7.2">1</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS2.p2">
        <p>Next, with the vector <Math mode="inline" tex="\omega\in\mathbb{R}^{|\mathcal{E}_{h}|}" text="omega element-of R ^ (absolute-value@(E _ h))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p2.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m1.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we
associate an operator <Math mode="inline" tex="D_{\omega}:{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}\mapsto{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}" text="D _ omega colon V _ h maps-to V _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The
action of the operator is determined by defining
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{e}(D_{\omega}{{\mathbf{v}}})" text="sigma _ e * D _ omega * v" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p2.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m3.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, since these
degrees of freedom uniquely determine any element from <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}" text="V _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We
set</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:operator" xml:id="A1.E5">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.5)</tag>

          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sigma_{e}(D_{\omega}{{\mathbf{v}}})=\omega_{e}\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{v}}})." text="sigma _ e * D _ omega * v = omega _ e * sigma _ e * v" xml:id="A1.E5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="A1.E5.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="A1.E5.m1.2">

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.E5.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.E5.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>

      <para xml:id="A1.SS2.p3">
        <p>The discrete gradient is defined as adjoint of the “<Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{div}}" text="div" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>” in the
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\cdot,\cdot)_{*,1}" text="(open-interval@(cdot, cdot)) _ (list@(*, 1))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m2.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m2.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m2.3">⋅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m2.4">⋅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m2.1">*</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m2.2">1</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> inner product and denoted by “<Math mode="inline" tex="\nabla_{h}" text="nabla _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>”. For
<Math mode="inline" tex="q\in W_{h}" text="q element-of W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\nabla_{h}q" text="(nabla _ h)@(q)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the unique element in <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}" text="V _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfying</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:discrete-grad" xml:id="A1.E6">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.6)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">A.6</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="({{\mathbf{v}}},\nabla_{h}q)_{*,1}=-({\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}},q),%&#10;\quad\mbox{for all}\quad{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}." text="formulae@((open-interval@(v, (nabla _ h)@(q))) _ (list@(*, 1)) = list@(- open-interval@(div@(v), q), [for all]), v element-of V _ h)" xml:id="A1.E6.m1">

                                  </XMApp>

                              </XMDual>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.E6.m1.6.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>A straightforward computation (by taking <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{v}}}={{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}" text="v = psi _ e" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) shows that</p>
        <equation xml:id="A1.Ex4">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sigma_{e}(\nabla_{h}q)=\frac{{[\![{q}]\!]}_{e}}{\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}},%&#10;\quad{[\![{q}]\!]}_{e}=q_{-,e}-q_{+,e}." text="formulae@(sigma _ e * (nabla _ h)@(q) = (delimited-[]@(delimited-[]@(q))) _ e / (norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2, (delimited-[]@(delimited-[]@(q))) _ e = q _ (list@(-, e)) - q _ (list@(+, e)))" xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="A1.Ex4.m1.9"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.9">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex4.m1.9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex4.m1.9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.9.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex4.m1.9.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.9.1.1">
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.Ex4.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>

                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>

                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>

                              </XMApp>

                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.3">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.9.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>

                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>

                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>

                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>

                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.5">e</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                              <XMApp>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.6">+</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex4.m1.7">e</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>For Dirichlet boundary faces (edges) <Math mode="inline" tex="{[\![{q}]\!]}_{e}=q_{+,e}" text="(delimited-[]@(delimited-[]@(q))) _ e = q _ (list@(+, e))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m8.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m8.4">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                          <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m8.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m8.3">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m8.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p3.m8.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m8.1">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p3.m8.2">e</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
We have the following proposition:</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_proposition" inlist="thm theorem:proposition" labels="LABEL:proposition:simple" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Proposition A.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">A.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition A.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition A.1</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}" text="v element-of V _ h" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{e}&gt;0" text="omega _ e &gt; 0" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> for all
<Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem1.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. We then have</text></p>
          <itemize xml:id="A1.I1">
            <item xml:id="A1.I1.ix3">

              <para xml:id="A1.I1.ix3.p1">
                <p><Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbf{u}}},{{\mathbf{v}}})_{*,\omega}=(D_{\omega}{{\mathbf{u}}},{{\mathbf%&#10;{v}}})_{*,1}" text="(open-interval@(u, v)) _ (list@(*, omega)) = (open-interval@(D _ omega * u, v)) _ (list@(*, 1))" xml:id="A1.I1.ix3.p1.m1">

            <item xml:id="A1.I1.ix4">
              <tags>
                <tag>(ii)</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item (ii)</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="A1.I1.ix4.p1">
                <p><text font="italic">The bilinear form on </text><Math mode="inline" tex="W_{h}\times W_{h}" text="W _ h * W _ h" xml:id="A1.I1.ix4.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic"> defined by</text></p>
                <equation xml:id="A1.Ex5">
                  <Math mode="display" tex="(D_{\omega}\nabla_{h}\varphi,\nabla_{h}\chi)_{*,1}=\sum_{e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}}%&#10;\frac{\omega_{e}}{\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}}{[\![{\varphi}]\!]}_{e}{[\![{\chi}%&#10;]\!]}_{e}" text="(open-interval@(D _ omega * (nabla _ h)@(varphi), (nabla _ h)@(chi))) _ (list@(*, 1)) = (sum _ (e element-of E _ h))@((omega _ e / (norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) * (delimited-[]@(delimited-[]@(varphi))) _ e * (delimited-[]@(delimited-[]@(chi))) _ e)" xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.Ex5.m1.6"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.Ex5.m1.7"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                              <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1.7">

                            </XMWrap>

                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1.2">1</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
