                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="A1.Ex5.m1.3"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1.3">
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                      <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="A1.Ex5.m1.8"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1.8">
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex5.m1.4"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1.4">φ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="A1.Ex5.m1.9"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1.9">
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex5.m1.5"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex5.m1.5">χ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>
                </equation>
                <p><text font="italic">is symmetric and positive definite on </text><Math mode="inline" tex="W_{h}" text="W _ h" xml:id="A1.I1.ix4.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">.</text></p>
              </para>
            </item>
          </itemize>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS2.p4">
          <p>(i) follows directly from the definition of
<Math mode="inline" tex="D_{\omega}" text="D _ omega" xml:id="A1.SS2.p4.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="(\cdot,\cdot)_{*,\omega}" text="(open-interval@(cdot, cdot)) _ (list@(*, omega))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p4.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p4.m2.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p4.m2.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p4.m2.3">⋅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p4.m2.4">⋅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p4.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p4.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p4.m2.1">*</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p4.m2.2">ω</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS2.p5">
          <p>Regarding (ii), we take <Math mode="inline" tex="\chi=\varphi" text="chi = varphi" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and we obtain</p>
          <equation xml:id="A1.Ex6">
            <Math mode="display" tex="(D_{\omega}\nabla_{h}\varphi,\nabla_{h}\varphi)_{*,1}=(\nabla_{h}\varphi,%&#10;\nabla_{h}\varphi)_{*,\omega}=\sum_{e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}}\frac{\omega_{e}}{\|{{%&#10;\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}}({[\![{\varphi}]\!]}_{e})^{2}\geq 0." text="(open-interval@(D _ omega * (nabla _ h)@(varphi), (nabla _ h)@(varphi))) _ (list@(*, 1)) = (open-interval@((nabla _ h)@(varphi), (nabla _ h)@(varphi))) _ (list@(*, omega)) = (sum _ (e element-of E _ h))@((omega _ e / (norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) * ((delimited-[]@(delimited-[]@(varphi))) _ e) ^ 2) &gt;= 0" xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.7"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.7">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.7.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.7.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.7.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>

                            <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.7.2">
                              <XMApp>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.1">*</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.2">1</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.7.3"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.7.3">
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>

                            <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.7.4">
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.3">*</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.4">ω</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.5"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.5">
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.7.5"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.7.5">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.7.5.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.7.5.1">
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="A1.Ex6.m1.6"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex6.m1.6">φ</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="-1.7pt" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>To show that this inequality is strict (which implies positive
definiteness of the bilinear form) we observe that if we have Dirichlet
conditions on part of, or, the whole boundary then the matrix
corresponding to this bilinear form is a symmetric, weakly diagonally
dominant <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-matrix and hence it is positive definite. If we have
Neumann conditions on <Math mode="inline" tex="\partial\Omega" text="partial-differential@(Omega)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then setting
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\nabla_{h}\varphi,\nabla_{h}\varphi)_{*,\omega}=0" text="(open-interval@((nabla _ h)@(varphi), (nabla _ h)@(varphi))) _ (list@(*, omega)) = 0" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m4.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m4.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m4.3">
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m4.4">
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m4.1">*</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m4.2">ω</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> implies that
<Math mode="inline" tex="q_{+,e}=q_{-,e}" text="q _ (list@(+, e)) = q _ (list@(-, e))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m5.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m5.1">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m5.2">e</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m5.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p5.m5.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m5.3">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m5.4">e</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and we conclude that <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
is a constant on <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega" text="Omega" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Since the average of <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> (in case of
Neumann conditions) we conclude that <Math mode="inline" tex="q=0" text="q = 0" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Thus, the bilinear form
has a trivial kernel and is positive definite on <Math mode="inline" tex="W_{h}" text="W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS2.p5.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. The proof of (ii) is
<!--  %**** String Line 2200 **** -->complete.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" xml:id="A1.SS3">
      <tags>
        <tag>A.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">A.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§A.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=". ">A.3</tag>A discrete <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">a priori</text> estimate</title>
      <toctitle><tag close=" ">A.3</tag>A discrete <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">a priori</text> estimate</toctitle>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p1">
        <p>Recall that <Math mode="inline" tex="K(x)" text="K * x" xml:id="A1.SS3.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p1.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p1.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="A1.SS3.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are a piece-wise constant
tensor-functions whose discontinuities are aligned with the
triangulation <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{T}_{h}" text="T _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For any face <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="e=\overline{T}_{e}^{+}\cap\overline{T}_{e}^{-}" text="e = ((overline@(T)) _ e) ^ + intersection ((overline@(T)) _ e) ^ -" xml:id="A1.SS3.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we
now define</p>
        <equationgroup labels="LABEL:eq:alphae" xml:id="A1.E7">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.7)</tag>

          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>We have the following lemma which is a crucial ingredient in the proof
of the discrete inf-sup condition.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lemma:mass-equivalence" xml:id="A1.Thmlemma1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma A.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">A.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma A.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma A.1</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.Thmlemma1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{\alpha}\in\mathbb{R}^{|\mathcal{E}_{h}|}" text="widehat@(alpha) element-of R ^ (absolute-value@(E _ h))" xml:id="A1.Thmlemma1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

                        <XMApp>

                            <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and

            <item xml:id="A1.I2.ix7">
              <tags>
                <tag>(iii)</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item (iii)</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="A1.I2.ix7.p1">
                <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{\alpha}_{e}\leq 2" text="(widehat@(alpha)) _ e less= 2" xml:id="A1.I2.ix7.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic"> and
</text><Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{\kappa}_{e}\geq\frac{1}{2}" text="(widehat@(kappa)) _ e &gt;= 1 / 2" xml:id="A1.I2.ix7.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">.</text></p>
              </para>
            </item>
          </itemize>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p2">
          <p>To prove the first inequality in (i), let <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{u}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}_{h}" text="u element-of V _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then, for all <Math mode="inline" tex="T\in T_{h}" text="T element-of T _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> we have <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{u}}}\big{|}_{T}=\sum_{e\subset\partial T}\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}}){%&#10;{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}" text="evaluated-at@(u, T) = (sum _ (e subset-of partial-differential@(T)))@(sigma _ e * u * psi _ e)" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="evaluated-at"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p2.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p2.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m3.1">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m3.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p2.m3.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m3.3">u</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and, hence,</p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="Ax1.EGx6">
            <equation xml:id="A1.Ex10">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle\|{{\mathbf{u}}}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha}=\sum_{T}\int_{T}\alpha_{T}{{%&#10;\mathbf{u}}}\cdot{{\mathbf{u}}}=\sum_{T}\sum_{e\in\partial T}\sum_{e^{\prime}%&#10;\in\partial T}\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}})\sigma_{e^{\prime}}({{\mathbf{u}}})%&#10;\int_{T}\alpha_{T}{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\cdot{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e^{\prime}}\leq\sum_{T}%&#10;\sum_{e\in\partial T}\sum_{e^{\prime}\in\partial T}|\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}})%&#10;||\sigma_{e^{\prime}}({{\mathbf{u}}})|\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|_{0,\alpha,T}\|{{%&#10;\bm{\psi}}}_{e^{\prime}}\|_{0,\alpha,T}\leq\frac{1}{2}\sum_{T}\sum_{e\in%&#10;\partial T}\sum_{e^{\prime}\in\partial T}\left([\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}})]^{2%&#10;}\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha,T}+[\sigma_{e^{\prime}}({{\mathbf{u}}})]^%&#10;{2}\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e^{\prime}}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha,T}\right)=(d+1)\sum_{T}\sum_{e%&#10;\in\partial T}[\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}})]^{2}\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}_{0,%&#10;\alpha,T}." text="((norm@(u)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha)) = (sum _ T)@((integral _ T)@((alpha _ T * u) cdot u)) = (sum _ T)@((sum _ (e element-of partial-differential@(T)))@((sum _ (e ^ prime element-of partial-differential@(T)))@(sigma _ e * u * sigma _ (e ^ prime) * u * (integral _ T)@((alpha _ T * psi _ e) cdot psi _ (e ^ prime))))) less= (sum _ T)@((sum _ (e element-of partial-differential@(T)))@((sum _ (e ^ prime element-of partial-differential@(T)))@(absolute-value@(sigma _ e * u) * absolute-value@(sigma _ (e ^ prime) * u) * (norm@(psi _ e)) _ (list@(0, alpha, T)) * (norm@(psi _ (e ^ prime))) _ (list@(0, alpha, T))))) less= (1 / 2) * (sum _ T)@((sum _ (e element-of partial-differential@(T)))@((sum _ (e ^ prime element-of partial-differential@(T)))@((delimited-[]@(sigma _ e * u)) ^ 2 * ((norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha, T)) + (delimited-[]@(sigma _ (e ^ prime) * u)) ^ 2 * ((norm@(psi _ (e ^ prime))) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha, T))))) = (d + 1) * (sum _ T)@((sum _ (e element-of partial-differential@(T)))@((delimited-[]@(sigma _ e * u)) ^ 2 * ((norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha, T))))" xml:id="A1.Ex10.m4">

                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMDual>
                                          </XMApp>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math></td>

                    <td align="right"/>

                        <XMath>

                      </Math></td>
                    <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle(d+1)\sum_{T}\sum_{e\in\partial T}[\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}})]^{2%&#10;}\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha,T}." text="(d + 1) * (sum _ T)@((sum _ (e element-of partial-differential@(T)))@((delimited-[]@(sigma _ e * u)) ^ 2 * ((norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha, T))))" xml:id="A1.Ex10.m3">

                </MathBranch>
              </MathFork>
            </equation>
          </equationgroup>
          <p>In the last step we have used <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{e\in\partial T}1=(d+1)" text="(sum _ (e element-of partial-differential@(T)))@(1) = d + 1" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p2.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m4.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Switching the order of summation in the right side of the inequality above then gives</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:norm-equivalence" xml:id="A1.E8">
            <tags>
              <tag>(A.8)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">A.8</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{array}[]{rcl}\|{{\mathbf{u}}}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha}&amp;\leq&amp;(d+1)\sum_{e\in%&#10;\mathcal{E}_{h}}\left(\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha,T^{+}_{e}}+\|{{\bm{%&#10;\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha,T_{e}^{-}}\right)[\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}}})]^{2}%&#10;\\&#10;&amp;=&amp;(d+1)\sum_{e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}}\widehat{\alpha}_{e}[\sigma_{e}({{\mathbf{u}%&#10;}})]^{2}\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}=(d+1)\|{{\mathbf{u}}}\|^{2}_{*,\widehat{%&#10;\alpha}}.\end{array}" text="Array[[((norm@(u)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha)), less=, (d + 1) * (sum _ (e element-of E _ h))@((((norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha, (T ^ +) _ e)) + ((norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha, (T _ e) ^ -))) * (delimited-[]@(sigma _ e * u)) ^ 2)], [, =, (d + 1) * (sum _ (e element-of E _ h))@((widehat@(alpha)) _ e * (delimited-[]@(sigma _ e * u)) ^ 2 * (norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) = (d + 1) * ((norm@(u)) ^ 2) _ (list@(*, widehat@(alpha)))]]" xml:id="A1.E8.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMArray role="ARRAY" vattach="middle">
                  <XMRow>

                            </XMWrap>

                                          </XMApp>

            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>To prove the equivalence in (i) for <Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{\alpha}_{e}=1" text="(widehat@(alpha)) _ e = 1" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we observe that for <Math mode="inline" tex="T\in\mathcal{T}_{h}" text="T element-of T _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
we have the following equivalence relation
with constants only depending on the geometry of <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
(bounded for shape regular triangulation):</p>

          <p>The equivalence (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:mass-matrix"/>) is just spectral equivalence between the
element mass matrix
<Math mode="inline" tex="\{({{\bm{\psi}}}_{e},{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e^{\prime}})\}_{e,e^{\prime}\in\partial T}" text="(set@(open-interval@(psi _ e, psi _ (e ^ prime)))) _ (list@(e, e ^ prime) element-of partial-differential@(T))" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m9">

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          </XMApp>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>

                  </XMApp>

              </XMath>
            </Math>
and its diagonal <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\|{{\bm{\psi}}}\|^{2}\}_{e\in\partial T}" text="(set@((norm@(psi)) ^ 2)) _ (e element-of partial-differential@(T))" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p2.m10.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m10.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p2.m10.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p2.m10.1">ψ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> which is easy
to establish, for example, by using the explicit form of the basis
functions given in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:RT-basis"/>)
and (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:RT-basis-cube"/>).
This completes the proof of (i).</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p3">
          <p>Items (ii) and (iii) directly follow from the definitions and
the inequality (<ref labelref="LABEL:bound_below_K"/>) which implies that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\|\alpha\|_{\ell^{2}}\leq 1" text="(norm@(alpha)) _ (ell ^ 2) less= 1" xml:id="A1.SS3.p3.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p3.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p3.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
<!--  %**** String Line 2300 **** -->      <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p4">
        <p>An immediate corollary from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:proposition:simple"/>
and Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemma:mass-equivalence"/> is the following Poincaré  inequality.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_corollary" inlist="thm theorem:corollary" labels="LABEL:lemma:Poincare" xml:id="A1.Thmcorollary1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Corollary A.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">A.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary A.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary A.1</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.Thmcorollary1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">If <Math mode="inline" tex="\omega_{e}=1" text="omega _ e = 1" xml:id="A1.Thmcorollary1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.Thmcorollary1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> we have</text></p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:Poincare" xml:id="A1.E10">
            <tags>
              <tag>(A.10)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">A.10</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\|\chi\|^{2}\leq C_{P}\|\nabla_{h}\chi\|^{2}_{*,1}," text="(norm@(chi)) ^ 2 less= C _ P * ((norm@((nabla _ h)@(chi))) ^ 2) _ (list@(*, 1))" xml:id="A1.E10.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.E10.m1.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.E10.m1.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.E10.m1.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E10.m1.3">χ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E10.m1.4.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.E10.m1.4.1">
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.E10.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.E10.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.E10.m1.1">*</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.E10.m1.2">1</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">with a constant <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{P}" text="C _ P" xml:id="A1.Thmcorollary1.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> independent of <Math mode="inline" tex="h" text="h" xml:id="A1.Thmcorollary1.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p5">
          <p>To prove this Poincaré  inequality we recall a classical result on the solvability of the
mixed discretizations of the Laplace equation. It is well known
(see, for example, <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="2013BoffiD_BrezziF_FortinM-aa" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, (7.1.28) and Proposition
5.4.3]</cite>; also <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="2002ArnoldD-aa" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>), that the
following estimate holds with <Math mode="inline" tex="\widetilde{\gamma}&gt;0" text="widetilde@(gamma) &gt; 0" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> independent of
<Math mode="inline" tex="h" text="h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="q\in W_{h}" text="q element-of W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>:</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:inf-sup-1" xml:id="A1.E11">
            <tags>
              <tag>(A.11)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">A.11</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}}\frac{(q,{\operatorname%&#10;{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{1}}}\geq\widetilde{\gamma}%&#10;\|q\|." text="(supremum _ (v element-of V _ h))@(open-interval@(q, div@(v)) / (norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ 1) &gt;= widetilde@(gamma) * norm@(q)" xml:id="A1.E11.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.E11.m1.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.E11.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.E11.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.E11.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E11.m1.1">q</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="A1.E11.m1.2">
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E11.m1.3"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E11.m1.3">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.E11.m1.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E11.m1.4">q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Since by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemma:mass-equivalence"/>(i) the norms <Math mode="inline" tex="\|\cdot\|" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="\|\cdot\|_{*,1}" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p5.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p5.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m5.1">*</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m5.2">1</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are equivalent norms on <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\bm{V}}}_{h}" text="V _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, for any
<Math mode="inline" tex="\chi\in W_{h}" text="chi element-of W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>:</p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="Ax1.EGx7">
            <equation xml:id="A1.Ex12">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle\|\nabla_{h}\chi\|_{*,1}=\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}_{h}}%&#10;\frac{(\nabla_{h}\chi,{{\mathbf{v}}})_{*,1}}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{*,1}}=\sup_{{%&#10;{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}_{h}}\frac{(\chi,{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})%&#10;}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{*,1}}\gtrsim\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}_{h}}\frac{%&#10;(\chi,{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|}\geq\sup_{{{%&#10;\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}}_{h}}\frac{(\chi,{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})}%&#10;{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{1}}}\geq\widetilde{\gamma}\|\chi\|." text="(norm@((nabla _ h)@(chi))) _ (list@(*, 1)) = (supremum _ (v element-of V _ h))@((open-interval@((nabla _ h)@(chi), v)) _ (list@(*, 1)) / (norm@(v)) _ (list@(*, 1))) = (supremum _ (v element-of V _ h))@(open-interval@(chi, div@(v)) / (norm@(v)) _ (list@(*, 1))) greater-than-or-equivalent-to (supremum _ (v element-of V _ h))@(open-interval@(chi, div@(v)) / norm@(v)) &gt;= (supremum _ (v element-of V _ h))@(open-interval@(chi, div@(v)) / (norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ 1) &gt;= widetilde@(gamma) * norm@(chi)" xml:id="A1.Ex12.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex12.m4.22"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                              <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>

                              <XMDual>

                                </XMApp>

                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex12.m3.6">v</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post11"/>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex12.m3.7"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex12.m3.7">χ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math></td>
                  </tr>
                </MathBranch>
              </MathFork>
            </equation>
          </equationgroup>
          <p>Therefore, (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:Poincare"/>) holds with <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{P}=\widetilde{\gamma}^{-2}" text="C _ P = (widetilde@(gamma)) ^ (- 2)" xml:id="A1.SS3.p5.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" xml:id="A1.Thmremark1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Remark A.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">A.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Remark A.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark A.1</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.Thmremark1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Clearly, for a scalar coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="K(x)" text="K * x" xml:id="A1.Thmremark1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.Thmremark1.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Thmremark1.p1.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> the edge weights <Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{\kappa}_{e}" text="(widehat@(kappa)) _ e" xml:id="A1.Thmremark1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> are weighted
harmonic averages of the values of the coefficient on the
two elements sharing the face <Math mode="inline" tex="e" text="e" xml:id="A1.Thmremark1.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. On a uniform mesh, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}_{0,\alpha,T_{e}^{\pm}}/\|{{\bm{\psi}}}_{e}\|^{2}=|%&#10;\alpha_{T_{e}^{\pm}}|/2" text="((norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2) _ (list@(0, alpha, (T _ e) ^ plus-or-minus)) / (norm@(psi _ e)) ^ 2 = absolute-value@(alpha _ ((T _ e) ^ plus-or-minus)) / 2" xml:id="A1.Thmremark1.p1.m4">
                <XMath>

                          <XMDual>

                            <XMWrap>

                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>

              </Math> we have that</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="A1.Ex13">

          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">On a non-uniform mesh or for tensor coefficient <Math mode="inline" tex="K(x)" text="K * x" xml:id="A1.Thmremark1.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
the average is more complicated and involves weights depending
on geometrical quantities describing pairs of neighboring elements.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p6">
        <p>Consider now <Math mode="inline" tex="q\in W_{h}" text="q element-of W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>

              <XMApp>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the solution of the variational problem</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:variational" xml:id="A1.E12">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.12)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">A.12</tag>
          </tags>

                          <XMApp>

                              </XMWrap>
