                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.E12.m1.6.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>In accordance with Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:proposition:simple"/>(ii) the
solution to the variational problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:variational"/>)
<Math mode="inline" tex="\varphi" text="varphi" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> exists and is unique.
We further set</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:def-w" xml:id="A1.E13">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.13)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">A.13</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="{{\mathbf{w}}}=D_{\widehat{\kappa}}\nabla_{h}\varphi" text="w = D _ (widehat@(kappa)) * (nabla _ h)@(varphi)" xml:id="A1.E13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and by the definition of <Math mode="inline" tex="\nabla_{h}" text="nabla _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we have
<Math mode="inline" tex="-({\operatorname{div}}D_{\widehat{\kappa}}\nabla_{h}\varphi,\chi)_{*,1}=(q,\chi)" text="- (open-interval@(div@(D _ (widehat@(kappa))) * (nabla _ h)@(varphi), chi)) _ (list@(*, 1)) = open-interval@(q, chi)" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p6.m5.6"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p6.m5.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m5.6">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m5.3">χ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p6.m5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p6.m5.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m5.1">*</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m5.2">1</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p6.m5.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p6.m5.5"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m5.4">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m5.5">χ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\chi\in W_{h}" text="chi element-of W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p6.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which implies that</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:div-w" xml:id="A1.E14">
          <tags>
            <tag>(A.14)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">A.14</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\operatorname{div}}D_{\widehat{\kappa}}\nabla_{h}\varphi=-q." text="div@(D _ (widehat@(kappa))) * (nabla _ h)@(varphi) = - q" xml:id="A1.E14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="A1.E14.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="A1.E14.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p7">
        <p>Next, we prove an a priori estimate needed for the proof of a contrast
independent inf-sup condition.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lemma:a-priori" xml:id="A1.Thmlemma2">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma A.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">A.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma A.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma A.2</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.Thmlemma2.p1">
          <p class="ltx_emph"><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\varphi\in W_{h}" text="varphi element-of W _ h" xml:id="A1.Thmlemma2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be the solution of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:variational"/>) and
let <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{w}}}\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}" text="w element-of V _ h" xml:id="A1.Thmlemma2.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be defined as in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:def-w"/>), namely,
<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{w}}}=D_{\widehat{\kappa}}\nabla_{h}\varphi" text="w = D _ (widehat@(kappa)) * (nabla _ h)@(varphi)" xml:id="A1.Thmlemma2.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Then the following
<!--  %**** String Line 2375 **** --></text>a priori<text font="italic"> estimate holds</text></p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:a-priori" xml:id="A1.E15">
            <tags>
              <tag>(A.15)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">A.15</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\|{{\mathbf{w}}}\|^{2}_{*,\widehat{\alpha}}\leq 2C_{P}\|q\|^{2}." text="((norm@(w)) ^ 2) _ (list@(*, widehat@(alpha))) less= 2 * C _ P * (norm@(q)) ^ 2" xml:id="A1.E15.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.E15.m1.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.E15.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.E15.m1.3"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E15.m1.3">w</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="A1.E15.m1.1">*</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="A1.E15.m1.2">

                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p8">
          <p>The proof follows from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:proposition:simple"/>,
Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemma:mass-equivalence"/> and some simple equalities. We have</p>
          <equationgroup xml:id="A1.Ex14">
            <equation xml:id="A1.Ex14X">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle\|{{\mathbf{w}}}\|^{2}_{*,\widehat{\alpha}}=(D_{\widehat{\alpha}}%&#10;{{\mathbf{w}}},{{\mathbf{w}}})_{*,1}" text="((norm@(w)) ^ 2) _ (list@(*, widehat@(alpha))) = (open-interval@(D _ (widehat@(alpha)) * w, w)) _ (list@(*, 1))" xml:id="A1.Ex14X.m1">

                <MathBranch>
                  <td align="right"><Math tex="\displaystyle\|{{\mathbf{w}}}\|^{2}_{*,\widehat{\alpha}}" text="((norm@(w)) ^ 2) _ (list@(*, widehat@(alpha)))" xml:id="A1.Ex14X.m2">

                              </XMApp>

                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math></td>
                  <td align="left"><Math tex="\displaystyle=(D_{\widehat{\alpha}}{{\mathbf{w}}},{{\mathbf{w}}})_{*,1}" text="absent = (open-interval@(D _ (widehat@(alpha)) * w, w)) _ (list@(*, 1))" xml:id="A1.Ex14X.m3">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.Ex14X.m3.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.Ex14X.m3.3"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex14X.m3.4">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex14X.m3.3">w</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>

          </equationgroup>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p9">
          <p>We now use the Poincaré  inequality to estimate <Math mode="inline" tex="\|\varphi\|" text="norm@(varphi)" xml:id="A1.SS3.p9.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS3.p9.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS3.p9.m1.1">φ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>:
<!--  %**** String Line 2400 **** --></p>

          </equationgroup>
          <p>Note that we have used the inequality
<Math mode="inline" tex="\widehat{\kappa}_{e}\geq\frac{1}{2}" text="(widehat@(kappa)) _ e &gt;= 1 / 2" xml:id="A1.SS3.p9.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="e\in\mathcal{E}_{h}" text="e element-of E _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p9.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p10">
        <p>After all the preparatory work, we are ready to prove the discrete
inf-sup condition.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_theorem" inlist="thm theorem:theorem" labels="LABEL:theorem:inf-sup" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem2">
        <tags>
          <tag>Theorem A.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">A.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem A.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem A.2</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem2.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">The following inequality holds
with constant <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma&gt;0" text="gamma &gt; 0" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> independent of the contrast <Math mode="inline" tex="\kappa" text="kappa" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem2.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="kappa" role="UNKNOWN">κ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>:</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="A1.E16">
            <tags>
              <tag>(A.16)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">A.16</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\inf_{q\in W_{h}}\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}}\frac{%&#10;(q,{\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{\alpha}}%&#10;\;\|q\|}\geq\gamma." text="(infimum _ (q element-of W _ h))@((supremum _ (v element-of V _ h))@(open-interval@(q, div@(v)) / ((norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ alpha * norm@(q)))) &gt;= gamma" xml:id="A1.E16.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.E16.m1.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.E16.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E16.m1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.E16.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p11">
          <p>For all <Math mode="inline" tex="q\in W_{h}" text="q element-of W _ h" xml:id="A1.SS3.p11.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and with <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbf{w}}}" text="w" xml:id="A1.SS3.p11.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> defined as in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:def-w"/>) we have</p>
          <equationgroup xml:id="A1.Ex16">
            <equation xml:id="A1.Ex16X">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle\sup_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}}\frac{(q,{%&#10;\operatorname{div}}{{\mathbf{v}}})}{\|{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{\alpha}}}\geq%&#10;\|q\|^{2}/\left(\|{{\mathbf{w}}}\|_{0,\alpha}^{2}+\|{\operatorname{div}}{{%&#10;\mathbf{w}}}\|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}" text="(supremum _ (v element-of V _ h))@(open-interval@(q, div@(v)) / (norm@(v)) _ Lambda _ alpha) &gt;= (norm@(q)) ^ 2 / (((norm@(w)) _ (list@(0, alpha))) ^ 2 + (norm@(div@(w))) ^ 2) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="A1.Ex16X.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post11"/>
                              <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.Ex16X.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.Ex16X.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Ex16X.m1.1">q</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex16X.m1.2">
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">div</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.Ex16X.m1.3"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>

          <p>which completes the proof.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS3.p12">
        <p>The standard theory of mixed finite element methods then immediately
implies the following approximation result</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_theorem" inlist="thm theorem:theorem" labels="LABEL:theorem:cea" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3">
        <tags>
          <tag>Theorem A.3</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">A.3</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem A.3</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem A.3</text></tag>.</title>
<!--  %**** String Line 2450 **** -->        <para xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbf{u}}},p)\in{{\bm{H}}}_{N}({\operatorname{div}})\times L_{2}" text="open-interval@(u, p) element-of H _ N * div * L _ 2" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1.1">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1.2">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1.3">div</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be the solution of the mixed
problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:dual_mixed"/>) and
<Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbf{u}}}_{h},p_{h})\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}\times W_{h}" text="open-interval@(u _ h, p _ h) element-of V _ h * W _ h" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m2.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m2.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be the solution of the
discrete problem (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:dual_mixed_FEM"/>). Then the following estimate
holds</text></p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:eq:cea" xml:id="A1.E17">
            <tags>
              <tag>(A.17)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">A.17</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\|{{\mathbf{u}}}-{{\mathbf{u}}}_{h}\|_{\Lambda_{\alpha}}+\|p-p_{h}\|\leq C%&#10;\left(\inf_{{{\mathbf{v}}}\in{{\bm{V}}_{\hskip-0.569055pth}}}\|{{\mathbf{u}}}-%&#10;{{\mathbf{v}}}\|_{\Lambda_{\alpha}}+\inf_{q\in W_{h}}\|p-q\|\right)," text="(norm@(u - u _ h)) _ Lambda _ alpha + norm@(p - p _ h) less= C * ((infimum _ (v element-of V _ h))@((norm@(u - v)) _ Lambda _ alpha) + (infimum _ (q element-of W _ h))@(norm@(p - q)))" xml:id="A1.E17.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.E17.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.E17.m1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                              <XMRef idref="A1.E17.m1.1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="A1.E17.m1.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.E17.m1.1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="A1.E17.m1.1.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="A1.E17.m1.1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="A1.E17.m1.1.3">
                              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                                  <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="bold" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                      <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" lpadding="-0.6pt" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="A1.E17.m1.1.3.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.E17.m1.1.3.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                                  <XMTok meaning="infimum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">inf</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="A1.E17.m1.1.3.2"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.E17.m1.1.3.2">
                                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">where the constant <Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
depend on the shape
regularity of the mesh, the Poincaré constant <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{P}" text="C _ P" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, and the spatial dimension <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, but is
independent of the variations in <Math mode="inline" tex="K(x)" text="K * x" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.Thmtheorem3.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
    </subsection>
  </appendix>
